59a2('dul ba): gang lags pa de nyid 'phags pas bdag cag la stsol tam/ 'di ltar/ bdag cag la gang dkon pa de stsol cig /sring mo dag /khyed cag la ci zhig dkon/ 'phags pa/ chos mnyan pa'o/ /
59a3('dul ba): sring mo dag /bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas drug po dag 'jig rten du byung ba ni/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba yin te/ drug po de dag gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
59a4('dul ba): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba dang / mi nyid dang / dbus pa'i gnas su skye ba dang / dbang po ma tshang ba med pa dang / dge ba'i chos la 'dun
59a5('dul ba): pa'o/ /zhes legs par gsungs pas/ de'i phyir khyed cag dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa skyes pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'dra ste/ legs so/ /legs so/ /sring mo dag 'khod cig dang /
59a6('dul ba): kho bo khyed la chos bstan par bya'o/ /de dag gis de'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'khod pa dang / des de dag la chos bstan par brtsams so// //
59a7('dul ba): 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/ bam po re drug pa/ bu mo de yang ltad mo'i rang bzhin can yin pas ri mo blta zhing gzhan du song ngo / /de dag gis kyang chos mnyan nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i rkang
59b1('dul ba): pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te gtsug lag khang nas byung ngo / /bu mo des gzhan dag byung ba tshor nas sgo khang de nyid na ri mo blta zhing 'dug go /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de dag bskyal nas gtsug lag khang du
59b2('dul ba): 'jug par brtsams pa dang / des bu mo de sgo khang na 'dug pa mthong nas des de la smras pa/ bu mo khyod ma song ngam/ des 'dzum phyung ba dang / 'char kas de la 'o byas te yan lag dang nying lag dag mnams kun
59b3('dul ba): tu mnams so/ /bu mo de ngu zhing phyir byung nas pha'i gan du song ste smras pa/ yab/ bdag dge sbyong 'char kas gzhon nu ma dang bral bar bgyis so/ /bram ze des bsam pa/ gal te da cung zad smrar ni/ bdag
59b4('dul ba): gcig pu yin la/ 'di dag ni/ mang bas bdag la gnod pa byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yong bar 'gyur gyi/ gang du grogs rnyed par gyur pa na ra mda' bzlog par bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /rgyal
59b5('dul ba): byed kyi tshal dang mnyan yod kyi bar na gnas kyi shing ljon pa zhig yod pa de'i drung na bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam bram ze'i gsang tshig klog tu 'jug cing 'dug nas bram ze des/ de dag la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /
59b6('dul ba): dge sbyong 'char kas kho bo'i bu mo gzhon nu ma dang bral bar byas kyi/ khyed cag kho bo'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin gyi/ grogs gyis shig /bram ze dag ni/ yongs su mi rtog pa yin pas de dag dbyug
59b7('dul ba): pa dag thogs te der dong ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'chag cing 'dug pa de dag gis bzung zhing bkri bar brtsams pa dang / de dag gis de bsgul bar yang ma nus so/ /bcom
60a1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis gdul ba'i dus mkhyen nas de'i stobs dbri bar mdzad pa dang / de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka phar drangs/ tshur drangs te khrid do/ /tshe dang ldan pa
60a2('dul ba): 'char kas bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gnod pa dang / nyam nga ba dang / mi bde ba byung ba la mi dgongs so/ /snyam pa de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ 'di la gdams
60a3('dul ba): pa'i tha ma 'di yin pas khrid kyang bla'o/ /snyam du dgongs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal steng gi khang bzang gi gzhir gtogs pa na gnyid log
60a4('dul ba): cing 'dug pa se gol gyi sgras sad par mdzad nas bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ khyod kyis gya tsom du mi bya bar legs par brtag par bya'o/ /zhes go bar mdzad do/ /bcom ldan 'das
60a5('dul ba): k yis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal steng gi khang bzang gi gzhir gtogs pa na gnyid log cing 'dug pa lan gnyis lan gsum du se gol gyi sgras sad par mdzad nas bka'
60a6('dul ba): stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po/ khyod kyis gya tsom du mi bya bar legs par brtag par bya'o/ /zhes go bar mdzad do/ /bram ze de dag gis kyang tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor
60a7('dul ba): khrid do/ /de na rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo na skye bo phal po che'i tshogs dag bram ze rnams kyis dge sbyong 'char ka bzung ste rgyal po'i sgor khrid de 'ongs so/ /zhes sgra mthon po dang / sgra chen po 'byin
60b1('dul ba): to| |ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal steng gi khang bzang gi gzhir gtogs pa na gnyid log pa skye bo phal po che'i tshogs des sad nas des zho shas 'tsho ba dag la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /ci'i
60b2('dul ba): phyir skye bo phal po che'i tshogs 'di dag sgra mthon po dang / sgra chen po 'byin par byed/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha/ btsun pa 'char ka dang / bram ze'i bu mo zhig dang / bram ze zhig dang / bram ze'i khye'u lnga
60b3('dul ba): brgya tsam rgyal po'i pho brang gi chab sgo na blag cor mchi zhing mchis so/ /ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di la dgongs nas bdag la rgyal po chen po/ khyod
60b4('dul ba): kyis gya tsom du mi bya bar legs par brtag par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal to/ /snyam du rig go /mnyan yod na chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe rtsod pa chen po byung ba de'i tshe na rnga bo che rdung zhing / dung sgril ma yang
60b5('dul ba): 'bud par byed pas/ rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis zho shas 'tsho ba dag la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag /rnga bo che yang rdung zhig /dung sgril ma yang bus shig /de dag gis rnga bo che brdungs shing dung sgril ma
60b6('dul ba): bus pa dang / rgyal po dang bcas pa'i 'khor 'dus par gyur to/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ bram ze de dang / btsun pa 'char ka nang du thong zhig /de gnyis nang du 'ongs pa dang / rgyal pos bram ze de
60b7('dul ba): la smras pa/ bram ze/ khyed ci zer/ lha/ dge sbyong 'char kas bdag gi bu mo zhig gzhon nu ma dang bral bar bgyis so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ btsun pa 'char ka/ bram ze 'di de skad mchi na/
61a1('dul ba): khyod ci gsung / lha/ bdag gis de la sdig pa'i las ma bgyis so/ /rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /'di ji ltar dpyad par bya/ blon po rnams
61a2('dul ba): kyis smras pa/ lha/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod nyid spobs pa can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags pas/ lha nyid kyi zhal mchu 'di dgum du gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag /'di
61a3('dul ba): la ji ltar shes pas ni/ gzugs dag mthong mod/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyis ni/ bu mo brtag mod/ bu mo de btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du thong la brtag tu chug cig /de dag gis bu mo de btsun mo'i
61a4('dul ba): 'khor gyi nang du btang ba dang / btsun mo phreng ldan mas bu mo de pang bar bsnyal te smras pa/ bu mo/ bden par smros shig /gal te khyod btsun pa 'char kas gzhon nu ma dang bral bar byas na yang / de ni/ bram
61a5('dul ba): ze mdun na 'don gyi bu las rab tu byung ba yin pas/ khyod kyi khyim thab kyi thab rir 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /'on te khyod phyug chung ma rmas pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin na ni/ dge slong la yang dag pa ma
61a6('dul ba): yin pas bskur na/ sems can dmyal ba chen por 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /bu mo des smras pa/ rje mo/ bdag des gzhon nu ma dang bral bar ma bgyis te/ 'di ltar des 'o bgyis shing / yan lag dang /
61a7('dul ba): nyid lag dag kun tu mnams so/ /btsun mo phreng ldan mas smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod kyis don de tsam zhig la rgyal po dang bcas pa'i 'khor kun tu dkrugs so/ /ci/ pha dag kyang bu mo dag la 'o byed cing / yan
61b1('dul ba): lag dang / nying lag drag la mi nom mam/ kun tu mi nom mam/ de nas bud med rgan mo rnams kyis bu mo de brtag na/ ji tsam na phyug chung ma nyams par 'gyur nas de dag gis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha/ bu mo
61b2('dul ba): 'di phyug chung ma nyams so/ /rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /'di la gang yus/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha/ btsun pa 'char ka yus so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ shes
61b3('dul ba): ldan dag / dengs la bram ze 'di rgya skegs kyi khang par chug la/ mes sregs shig /bu mo de yang rte'u dmu rgod kyi rkang pa gnyis la thogs shig /bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag kyang lag pa dang / rkang pa
61b4('dul ba): dag chod cig / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ lha/ gal te bdag la brten te sems can de snyed cig chab stsal bar gyur na/ don gyis lhas bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa las phyung lags
61b5('dul ba): so| |rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag /'o na dengs la bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag thong la/ bram ze 'di ni/ rgya skegs kyi khang par chug la mes sregs shig /bu mo de yang rte'u dmu rgod kyi rkang pa
61b6('dul ba): gnyis la thogs shig / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ lha/ gal te bdag la brten te tha na grog ma phra mo 'ga' zhig la gnod par gyur na yang don gyis lhas bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa
61b7('dul ba): las phyung ba kho na lags so/ /rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag /bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos 'dod chags dang ma bral na yang so sor rtog pa'i stobs la ltos/ gal te bram ze
62a1('dul ba): dag gis btsun pa 'char ka thub par gyur na ni/ rdo gcig gis kyang gsod par 'gyur ro/ /shes ldan dag /dengs la thams cad khye zhig /de dag bkye nas 'gyes
62a2('dul ba): rnga brdungs shing yol bas bcad pa dang / skye bo phal po che'i tshogs dag so sor gyes so/ /rgyal po dang / btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka gsum 'dug pa na/ rgyal pos btsun mo
62a3('dul ba): phreng ldan ma la smras pa/ phreng ldan ma/ btsun pa 'char kas ji ltar bu'i phan phun byas pas rgyal po dang bcas pa'i 'khor kun tu dkrugs pa la ltos/ btsun mo phreng ldan mas tshe dang ldan pa
62a4('dul ba): 'char ka la smras pa/ btsun pa 'char ka/ khyod pas slad kyis rab tu byung ba dge slong ma ut+pa la'i mdog dang / dge tshul ma skul byed dang / dge tshul ma ci ri ka dang / gzhan yang mang po gang
62a5('dul ba): lags pa de dag thams cad kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du bgyis na/ khyod kyis ni/ rgyal po dang bcas pa'i 'khor gyi nang du mi mdzes pa 'di lta bu bgyis par
62a6('dul ba): gyur kyang da dung skyo ba mi mnga'am/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ phreng ldan ma/ da phyin chad 'khor bar 'khor ba na nyon mongs pa de lta bu dag kun tu spyod par mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o/ /zhes
62a7('dul ba): smras nas de stan las langs te song ngo / /de ngo tsha bas bcom ldan 'das dang 'phrad par ma nus nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces
62b1('dul ba): smras so/ /mkhan po/ ji ltar bdag 'khor bar 'khor ba na nyon mongs pa de lta bu dag kun tu spyod par mi 'gyur pa de ltar bdag la chos bstan du gsol/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsam
62b2('dul ba): pa| ltung ba lhag ma med pa byung bar ma gyur tam snyam na/ ji tsam na des lhag ma yod par mthong nas/ des de bshags par bya ba'i ltung ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang 'chags su bcug /bsdam
62b3('dul ba): par bya ba'i ltung ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang sdom du bcug nas des de la 'di dang 'di ltar yid la gyis la bag yod pas sgrubs shig / ces gdams ngag byin no/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char
62b4('dul ba): ka gcig pu dben pa/ bag yod pa/ rtun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid btang bar gnas pa na/ rigs kyi bu dag gang gi phyir skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar
62b5('dul ba): dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar byed pa tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de/ tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas/ bdag gi skye ba zad
62b6('dul ba): do| |tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/ /bya ba byas so/ /srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so/ /zhes go bar byed cing / dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba/ bong ba dang gser
62b7('dul ba): du mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan bzhag pa lta bu/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing / rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang
63a1('dul ba): dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa dang / 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang / bku sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang / nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /
63a2('dul ba): rjed par bya ba dang / mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dgra bcom pa nyid thob cing rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba nyams su myong ba na/ 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom
63a3('dul ba): ldan 'das ni/ bdag la phan pa mdzad pa/ bde bar gshegs pa ni/ bdag la legs par mdzad pa ste/ 'di ltar/ bcom ldan 'das de ni/ bdag gi sdug bsngal gyi chos mang po dag sel
63a4('dul ba): bar mdzad pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni/ bdag gi bde ba'i chos mang po dag sgrub par mdzad pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni/ bdag gi mi dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma dag sel bar mdzad pa/ bcom ldan
63a5('dul ba): 'das de ni/ bdag gi dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma dag sgrub par mdzad pa lags na/ bdag gis ci zhig byas na/ des bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan byas pa dang / nye bar byas pa dang / rab tu
63a6('dul ba): byas par 'gyur snyam nas/ des yang bsam pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ dka' ba mdzad pa brgya stong du ma dag gis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug
63a7('dul ba): yongs su rdzogs pa mdzad nas bla na med pa'i mkhyen pa thugs su chud pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni/ sems can la phan pa'i phyir yin pas/ bdag gis kyang sems can la phan pa bya'o/ /snyam mo//
63b1('dul ba): des bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim pa dad par byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa 'ga' yod dam snyam na/ des ji tsam na med par mthong ngo / /su la ltos snyam na/ bdag nyid la ltos par
63b2('dul ba): mthong nas/ legs kyi/ bdag gis ston pa'i thugs la dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /gang 'dul ba'i dus yin snyam na/ mnyan yod na bram ze zhi ba la dad pa/ zhi ba la bsnyen bkur
63b3('dul ba): byed pa zhig 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa/ bram ze de 'dul ba'i dus yin no/ /snyam nas de de'i gan du song ba dang / bram ze des kyang zhi ba la bsnyen bkur byas nas/ kye bram ze bram
63b4('dul ba): ze zhes bram ze tshol bar byed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ kho bo bram ze yin no/ /des smras pa/ bram ze ni/ thor tshugs can gyi khyod ni/ dge sbyong mgo reg yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char
63b5('dul ba): kas smras pa/ 'di ltar/ kho bo bram ze yin zhing / kho bo'i ston pa yang bram ze'i mchog yin na/ khyod ni/ zhi ba 'di la mngon par dad dam/ des smras pa/ mngon par dad do/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char
63b6('dul ba): kas smras pa/ kwa'i zhi ba smros shig /ji ltar kho bo bram ze yin zhing kho bo'i ston pa yang bram ze'i mchog yin nam/ zhi bas smras pa/ 'phags pa 'char ka/ de de bzhin te/ khyod ni/ bram ze lags shing / khyod
63b7('dul ba): kyi ston pa yang bram ze'i mchog lags so/ /bram ze des bsam pa/ bdag gis yun ring po nas zhi ba la bsnyen bkur byas na/ 'dis lan 'ga' rmi lam du yang ma bstan na/ btsun pa 'char kas
64a1('dul ba): smras pa la tshig smra bar byed pas/ kye ma btsun pa 'char ka ni/ rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba yin no/ /snyam nas/ des smras pa/ btsun pa 'char ka/ /ci'i slad du byon/ khyod
64a2('dul ba): nyid 'dul ba'i don du'o/ /btsun pa 'char ka /de'i slad du 'di nyid du bzhugs te zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzod cig /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de nyid du 'dug ste zas kyi bya ba byas pa dang / bram ze de
64a3('dul ba): chung ma dang bcas pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mdun du ches mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin khong du chud nas 'di
64a4('dul ba): ltar| bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar
64a5('dul ba): chos bstan to/ /des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa/ bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char ka la brten nas btsun pa 'char kas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la
64a6('dul ba): phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams
64a7('dul ba): pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag dang / mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni/ bskams/ rus pa'i ri dag ni/ bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni/ bkum/ mtho ris dang thar
64b1('dul ba): pa'i sgo dag ni/ phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dag nas ni/ rkang pa phyung / lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni/ bzhag /'khor ba ni/ mthar bgyis/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bas
64b2('dul ba): pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/ thob ste/ btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags so/ /btsun pa/ bdag
64b3('dul ba): ni| mngon par zhugs pa lags te/ btsun pa/ bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yi/ bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad nas
64b4('dul ba): ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/ /btsun pa 'char kas/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag gi bsod snyoms dang / na bza' dang / gnas mal dang / snyung ba'i rkyen dang /
64b5('dul ba): sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes bar ci gnang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ rab tu byung ba ni/ gzhan la phan pas rjes su 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas/ bram ze gzhan dag la yang phan pa
64b6('dul ba): bya dgos so/ /zhes smras te/ dang du ma blangs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas mnyan yod du bram ze'i khyim dang po gnyis ka nas btul cing bzhag go /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam
64b7('dul ba): pa/ gang 'dul ba'i dus yin snyam na/ mnyan yod na bram ze zhi ba la dad pa/ zhi ba la bsnyen bkur byed pa zhig 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa/ bram ze de 'dul ba'i dus yin no/ /snyam
65a1('dul ba): nas/ de de'i gan du song ba dang / bram ze des kyang zhi ba la bsnyen bkur byas nas/ kye bram ze bram ze zhes bram ze tshol bar byed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ kho bo bram
65a2('dul ba): ze yin no/ /des smras pa/ mgo reg 'di lta bu bram ze ga la yin/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ bram ze ji lta bu yin/ des smras pa/ bram ze ni/ ral pa can yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas ral
65a3('dul ba): pa can du sprul pa dang / ji tsam na/ bram ze de ngo mtshar skyes nas/ des smras pa/ btsun pa 'char ka /ci'i slad du byon/ khyod nyid 'dul ba'i don du'o/ /btsun pa 'char ka /de'i slad du 'di
65a4('dul ba): nyid du bzhugs te zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzod cig / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka der 'dug ste zas kyi bya ba byas pa dang / bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mdun du chos
65a5('dul ba): mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin khong du chud nas/ 'di ltar bram ze de chung ma dang bcas bas
65a6('dul ba): stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to/ /des
65a7('dul ba): bden pa mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa/ bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char ka la brten nas btsun pa 'char kas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la
65b1('dul ba): phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa
65b2('dul ba): dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag dag gis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag dang / mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni/ bskams/ rus pa'i ri dag las ni/ bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni/ bkum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag
65b3('dul ba): ni/ phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dag nas ni/ rkang pa phyung / lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni/ bzhag /'khor ba ni/ mthar bgyis/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags
65b4('dul ba): pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/ thob ste/ btsun pa 'char ka/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags so/ /btsun
65b5('dul ba): pa| bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags te/ btsun pa/ bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yi/ bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan
65b6('dul ba): chad nas ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/ /btsun pa 'char kas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag gi bsod snyoms dang / na bza' dang / gnas mal dang /
65b7('dul ba): snyung ba'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci gnang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ rab tu byung ba ni/ gzhan la phan pas rjes su 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas/ bram
66a1('dul ba): ze gzhan dag la yang phan pa bya dgos so/ /zhes smras te/ dang du ma blangs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas mnyan yod du bram ze'i khyim gnyis pa gnyi ga
66a2('dul ba): nas btul cing bzhag go / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa/ gang 'dul ba'i dus yin snyam na/ mnyan yod na bram ze ser sna can zhig 'dug pa de'i chung ma nor bu la dga' nas/ tshe
66a3('dul ba): dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa/ bram ze de 'dul ba'i dus yin no/ /snyam nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka nor bu mkhan gyi cha lugs su byas te de'i khyim du song nas nor bu su nyo/ /nor
66a4('dul ba): bu su nyo/ /zhes byas pa dang / bram ze mo des thos nas des smras pa/ nor bu dag rin ji tsam du 'tshong / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ nor bu 'di dag rin che mod kyi/ 'on kyang rin
66a5('dul ba): chung ngu'i phyir sbyin no/ /zhes tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas nor bu mkhan gyi cha lugs mi snang bar byas te rang gi cha lugs kyis 'dug pa dang / bram ze de ngo mtshar skyes nas des smras pa/ btsun
66a6('dul ba): pa 'char ka / ci'i slad du 'dir byon/ khyod nyid 'dul ba'i don du'o/ /btsun pa 'char ka /de'i slad du 'di nyid du bzhugs te zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzod cig /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas der
66a7('dul ba): 'dug ste zas kyi bya ba byas pa dang / bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i bsam pa dang / bag la
66b1('dul ba): nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin khong du chud nas/ 'di ltar/ bram ze chung ma dang bcas pas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom
66b2('dul ba): ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to/ /des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa/ bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char ka la brten nas btsun pa 'char
66b3('dul ba): kas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge
66b4('dul ba): sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni/ bskams/ rus pa'i ri dag las ni/
66b5('dul ba): bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni/ bkum/ mtho ris dang / thar pa'i sgo dag ni/ phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dag nas ni/ rkang pa phyung / lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du ni/
66b6('dul ba): bzhag /'khor ba ni/ mthar bgyis/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
66b7('dul ba): ni/ thob ste/ btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags so/ /btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags te/ btsun pa/ bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi
67a1('dul ba): dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yi/ bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/ /btsun
67a2('dul ba): pa 'char kas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag gi bsod snyoms dang / na bza' dang / gnas mal dang / snyung ba'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci gnang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas
67a3('dul ba): smras pa/ rab tu byung ba ni/ gzhan la phan pas rjes su 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas/ bram ze gzhan dag la yang phan par bya dgos so/ /zhes smras te/ dang du ma blangs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan
67a4('dul ba): pa 'char kas mnyan yod du bram ze khyim gsum pa gnyi ga nas btul cing bzhag go / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa/ gang 'dul ba'i dus yin snyam na/ mnyan yod na bram ze nad pa zhig 'dug
67a5('dul ba): pa de/ sman pa dag gis sman kha ba dang / tsha ba dang / bska ba dag gis yid byung nas/ des sgo ba la khyod kyis sman pa 'ga' yang nang du ma gtang zhig ces bsgos nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas
67a6('dul ba): bsam pa/ bram ze de 'dul ba'i dus yin no/ /snyam nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka sman pa'i cha lugs su byas te bram ze de'i khyim sgor sman pa 'ongs so/ /zhes byas te bsdad pa dang / sgo bas
67a7('dul ba): smras pa/ kho bo la bram zes/ khyod kyis sman pa 'ga' yang nang du ma gtang zhig /ces sgo ba kho bo de nyid kyi phyir bzhag go /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ khyod song la bram ze la sman pa
67b1('dul ba): 'ongs te/ de na re/ sman pa nga sman mi sbyin/ bya dga' yang mi slong bar gsang sngags dag gis sos par bya'o/ /zhes zer ro/ /zhes gyis shig /sgo ba song ste bram ze de la de skad rgyas par brjod pa dang / des
67b2('dul ba): smras pa/ nang du thong zhig /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka nang du zhugs nas des gsang sngags dag gis de sos par byas nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas sman pa'i cha lugs mi snang bar byas te rang gi cha lugs
67b3('dul ba): kyis 'dug pa dang / bram ze de do mtshar skyes nas des smras pa/ btsun pa 'char ka /ci'i slad du 'dir byon/ khyod nyid 'dul ba'i don du'o/ /btsun pa 'char ka /de'i slad du 'di nyid du bzhugs te
67b4('dul ba): zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzod cig / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka der 'dug ste zas kyi bya ba byas pa dang / bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug nas tshe dang
67b5('dul ba): ldan pa 'char kas de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin khong du chud nas 'di ltar/ bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i
67b6('dul ba): ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to/ /des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa/ bdag gis dge ba'i bshes
67b7('dul ba): gnyen btsun pa 'char ka la brten nas btsun pa 'char kas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis
68a1('dul ba): kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma
68a2('dul ba): bgyis te/ khrag dang / mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni/ bskams/ rus pa'i ri dag las ni/ bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni/ bkum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni/ phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud
68a3('dul ba): 'gro dang / yi dwags dag nas ni/ rkang pa phyung / lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du ni/ bzhag /'khor ba ni/ mthar bgyis/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse
68a4('dul ba): mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/ thob ste/ btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags so/ /btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags
68a5('dul ba): te| btsun pa/ bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yi/ bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba
68a6('dul ba): thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/ /btsun pa 'char kas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag gi bsod snyoms dang / na bza' dang / gnas mal dang / snyung ba'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad
68a7('dul ba): dag bzhes par ci gnang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ rab tu byung ba ni/ gzhan la phan pas rjes su 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas/ bram ze gzhan dag la yang phan pa bya
68b1('dul ba): dgos so/ /zhes smras te/ dang du ma blangs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas mnyan yod du bram ze'i khyim bzhi pa gnyi ga nas btul cing bzhag go /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa/ gang
68b2('dul ba): 'dul ba'i dus yin snyam na/ mnyan yod na bram ze phyug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/ ser sna can/ mig phra ba/ bya rog la yang gtor ma mi ster ba/
68b3('dul ba): yo byad kun tu 'dzin pa zhig 'dug pa de/ sgo drung na bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam bram ze'i gsang tshig dag klog tu 'jug nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa/ bram ze de 'dul ba'i dus yin
68b4('dul ba): no| |snyam nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka 'dul ba la ltos pas yang dang yang du der bsod snyoms la bzhugs nas/ des der lan 'ga' yang bsod snyoms ma thob nas/ de de nas phyir byung
68b5('dul ba): ba bram ze des mthong nas/ des smras pa/ kye dge sbyong / khyed yang dang yang du der 'jug na/ rnyed pa cung zad yod dam/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i dad pa'i nor las bsam ste smras pa/ bram ze
68b6('dul ba): khyod nyid la yang med na/ ci zhig sbyin par byed/ bram ze des spyos te smras pa/ dge sbyong khyod khyim mi dang bcas pa thams cad la sbyin par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas thabs yin no/ /
68b7('dul ba): zhes smras te song ngo / /de na bram ze'i khye'u dge slong gi rgyus shes pa zhig gis bram ze de la smras pa/ mkhan pos/ de dag gis thabs yin no/ /zhes bgyis pa de'i don ci lags mkhyen tam
69a1('dul ba): des smras pa/ mi shes so/ /skol gyis dang du blang ngo / /zhes smras pa gang lags pa de'i don ni/ de dag gis thabs yin no/ /zhes smras pa de lags so/ /des yang
69a2('dul ba): smras pa/ mkhan pos/ de dag gi khyim mi dang bcas pa thams cad ces bgyi ba de'i don ci lags mkhyen tam/ des smras pa/ mi shes so/ /de dag gi khyim mi dang bcas pa thams cad ces bgyi ba
69a3('dul ba): ni| rgyal rigs dge sbyong gau ta ma 'khor stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang bcas pa lags te/ de ltar na/ mkhan pos don gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs par gyur to/ /
69a4('dul ba): bram ze des smras pa/ kho bos bram ze rig byed gsum pa dang ldan pa dag ma mthong ngam/ ci na/ gang gi phyir dge sbyong mgo reg dag la sbyin par byed/ des smras pa/ dge sbyong des deng mkhan
69a5('dul ba): po'i mtshan gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun sang mkhan po'i sdum par spyan 'dren par bgyid do/ /bram zes smras pa/ ci'i phyir de de ltar byed/ des smras pa/ mkhan
69a6('dul ba): po| gal te bdag la thugs mi ches na/ bram ze'i khye'u zhig rtog tu gtang du gsol/ des bram ze'i khye'u zhig rtog tu btang ba dang / ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas sangs rgyas la
69a7('dul ba): sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun tshogs pa na/ rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug ste/ bram ze che ge mo zhig sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan
69b1('dul ba): 'dren to/ /zhes bram ze de'i ming gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du spyan drangs ba des thos so/ /bram ze'i khye'u des de thos nas phyir 'ongs te bram ze de la smras pa/
69b2('dul ba): mkhan po/ de bzhin te/ btsun pa 'char kas mkhan po'i mtshan gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun sang mkhan po'i sdum par spyan drangs kyi/ zhal zas sta gon bgyid du stsol
69b3('dul ba): cig / des smras pa/ kho bos bram ze'i rig byed gsum dang ldan pa dag ma mthong ngam/ ci na/ gang gi phyir dge sbyong mgo reg dag la sbyin par byed/ de dag khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi
69b4('dul ba): khyim du za bar 'gyur grang / ji tsam na de nang par langs pa dang dge slong chu'i gtsang sbyor dag bram ze de'i khyim du lhags te smras pa/ bram ze/ chu gang du gzhag par bya/ bram ze des smras pa/ khyim bdag mgon
69b5('dul ba): med zas sbyin gyi sdum par ro/ /de bzhin du bshos kyi gtsang sbyor dag lhags te smras pa/ bram ze/ zhal zas gang du brtag par bya/ bram ze des smras pa/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi sdum par
69b6('dul ba): ro| |bcom ldan 'das kyi gang gi ngor mgron du bos ba des dus sngar 'gro bar bya zhing / ma zin pa dag zin par bya'o/ /zhes bka' stsal pas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka nang par sngar langs te 'phags
69b7('dul ba): pa dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis lam kar de mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa 'char ka /gar bzhud/ des smras pa/ bram ze zhig gis bdag la brten te sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge
70a1('dul ba): 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pas der 'gro'o/ /khyim bdag gis smras pa/ bram ze de ni/ ma dad pa lags kyi/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi
70a2('dul ba): dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod bcad par gyur na mi rung gi / bdag kyang mchi'o/ /de gnyis der dong ba dang / ji tsam na bram ze de snying las chung ngur 'dug nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin
70a3('dul ba): gyis de la smras pa/ bram ze/ khyod kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs na/ ci'i phyir snying las chung ngur 'dug /zhal zas sta gon
70a4('dul ba): byed na/ ci nyes/ bram ze des smras pa/ kho bo bram ze rig byed gsum dang ldan pa dag ma mthong ngam/ ci na/ dge sbyong mgo reg dag la sbyin par byed/ khyod bdag gi khyim du zan byin cig /khyim
70a5('dul ba): bdag gis smras pa/ bram ze kho bo la 'byor pa med snyam mam/ kho bos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsod snyoms dang / na bza' dang / gnas mal dang /
70a6('dul ba): snyung ba'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad dag gis bsnyen bkur byed par yang spro mod kyi/ 'on kyang kho bo khyod la phan gdags pa'i phyir smra'i/ khyod snying las chung ngur ma 'dug par zhal zas sta gon
70a7('dul ba): gyis shig / 'di ltar/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun ni/ ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang / rgyal rigs dbyar tshul ma dang / bla mkhyen
70b1('dul ba): drang srong byin dang / rnying pa dang / kho bo dang / gzhan yang bram ze dang / khyim bdag rgya che rgu dag gis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas pa yin pas/ gal te khyod la brten nas sangs
70b2('dul ba): rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod bcad par gyur na/ khyod la rgyal po gdon mi za bar gnod pa byed par 'gyur zhing / khyod phyag sbal du bcug pas 'chi dgos par 'gyur pa gang
70b3('dul ba): yin pa de lta bu'i gnas kyang yod par 'gyur ro/ /bram ze de skrag ste bsam pa/ de ltar 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas smras pa/ khyim bdag /bdag gis zhal zas sta gon ma byas na/ da ji ltar bya/ khyim bdag
70b4('dul ba): gis smras pa/ bram ze/ mnyan yod na gang nyo bas mi rnyed pa'i rdzas de lta bu med kyi/ kaR+sha pa Na 'on cig dang / kho bos zhal zas sta gon bya'o/ /bram zes smras pa/ khyim bdag /kaR+sha pa Na ji snyed dag gis sangs
70b5('dul ba): rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gdugs tshod 'byor par 'gyur/ khyim bdag gis smras pa/ kaR+sha pa Na lnga brgyas so/ /bram ze des khyim bdag la kaR+sha pa Na lnga brgya phul nas/ khyim bdag
70b6('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyis de dag gi steng du kaR+sha pa Na gzhan dag gis kyang bsnan te zhal zas sta gon byas so/ /bram ze des smras pa/ khyim bdag /bdag la stsang sder dag kyang mi bdog go /khyim bdag
70b7('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ bram ze/ khyod stsang sder dag gis ma 'tsher bar snying las chung ngur 'dug cig dang / de dag drang srong gi snod dang bcas te gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sangs rgyas
71a1('dul ba): la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gshegs te bzhugs nas dge slong rnams kyis lhung bzed dag byi dor byas pa bram ze des mthong nas des bsam pa/ re zhig snod dag
71a2('dul ba): kyang bdag gis byi dor bya mi dgos so/ /snyam nas de mngon par dad par gyur te/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la smras pa/ btsun pa 'char ka/ khyod bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags kyi/ khyod
71a3('dul ba): kyis kyang brim pa mdzod la slad kyis bshos gsol cig / sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bshad pa mdzad de gdan las
71a4('dul ba): bzhengs te gshegs so/ /de nas bram ze des smras pa/ btsun pa 'char ka /da khyod bzhugs te zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzod cig /de 'dug pa dang bram ze de zas brims te des zas kyi bya ba byas pa
71a5('dul ba): dang | bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin
71a6('dul ba): khong du chud nas 'di ltar/ bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
71a7('dul ba): bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to/ /des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa/ bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char ka la brten nas btsun pa 'char kas bdag la gang
71b1('dul ba): mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze
71b2('dul ba): dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag dang / mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni/ bskams/ rus pa'i ri dag las ni/ bsgral/ ngan song
71b3('dul ba): gi sgo dag ni/ bkum/ mtho ris dang / thar pa'i sgo dag ni/ phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dag nas ni/ rkang pa phyung / lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du ni/ bzhag /'khor
71b4('dul ba): ba ni/ mthar bgyis/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ btsun
71b5('dul ba): pa| bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags so/ /btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags te/ btsun pa/ bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yi/ bdag
71b6('dul ba): dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/ /btsun pa 'char kas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag gi bsod snyoms dang / na bza'
71b7('dul ba): dang / gnas mal dang / snyung ba'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci gnang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ rab tu byung ba ni/ gzhan la phan pas rjes su 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin
72a1('dul ba): pas/ bram ze gzhan dag la yang phan pa bya dgos so/ /zhes smras te dang du ma blangs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas mnyan yod du bram ze'i khyim lnga pa
72a2('dul ba): gnyi ka nas btul cing bzhag go / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa/ gang 'dul ba'i dus yin snyam na/ mnyan yod na bram ze zhig 'dug pa de'i chung ma gzugs bzang ba/ blta
72a3('dul ba): na sdug pa/ mdzes pa yin pas/ de de la shin tu lhag par chags pas khyim du 'ga' yang 'jug tu mi ster nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa/ bram ze de 'dul ba'i dus yin no/ /snyam
72a4('dul ba): nas| de bram ze de'i khyim du song ba dang / ji tsam na bram ze de/ gcin gci zhing 'dug pas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka mthong nas smras pa/ dge sbyong ma 'jug par sdod cig /tshe dang ldan pa 'char
72a5('dul ba): kas 'di ltar bram ze'i gcin gyi rgyun mi 'chad pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka nang du zhugs te bram ze de'i chung ma de yang 'di ltar de'i lto na nang grol gang dag
72a6('dul ba): yod pa de dag thams cad phyi rol nas snang ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka phyir byung ba dang / bram ze des smras pa/ btsun pa 'char ka /khyod kyis bdag gi mchis brang
72a7('dul ba): gzigs sam/ des smras pa/ mthong ngo / /ci 'dra/ khyod kyis ji ltar mthong bar gyur pa de 'dra'o/ /de zhugs te bltas na/ de ltar mi sdug par mthong nas des de la smras pa/ bram ze mo/
72b1('dul ba): khyod kyis btsun pa 'char ka la cung zhig ma smras sam/ des smras pa/ cung zad kyang ma smras te/ 'di ltar/ des bdag spyos te dmod mo bgyis kyi/ bzhud la de la bzod pa gsol cig /de song ste smras
72b2('dul ba): pa| btsun pa 'char ka / bdag gi mchis brang la bzod pa mdzad du gsol/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ bzod par bya'o/ /des de sngon ji lta ba bzhin du gyur pa dang / bram ze de dad par gyur
72b3('dul ba): nas des smras pa/ btsun pa 'char ka ci'i slad du byon/ khyod nyid 'dul ba'i don du'o/ /btsun pa 'char ka /de'i slad du 'di nyid du bzhugs te zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzod cig /tshe dang ldan pa 'char
72b4('dul ba): ka der 'dug ste zas kyi bya ba byas pa dang / bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i bsam pa dang / bag
72b5('dul ba): la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin khong du chud nas 'di ltar/ bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi
72b6('dul ba): rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to/ /des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa/ bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char ka la
72b7('dul ba): brten nas btsun pa 'char kas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi pha mes
73a1('dul ba): dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag dang /
73a2('dul ba): mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni/ bskams/ rus pa'i ri dag las ni/ bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni/ bkum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni/ phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags
73a3('dul ba): dag nas ni/ rkang pa phyung / lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du ni/ bzhag /'khor ba ni/ mthar bgyis/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/
73a4('dul ba): ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/ thob ste/ btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags so/ /btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags te/ btsun pa/
73a5('dul ba): bdag ni/ bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yi/ bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo pa thag pa nas
73a6('dul ba): rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/ /btsun pa 'char ka ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag gi bsod snyoms dang / na bza' dang / gnas mal dang / snyung ba'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par
73a7('dul ba): ci gnang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ rab tu byung ba ni/ gzhan la phan pas rjes su 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas/ bram ze gzhan dag la yang phan pa bya dgos so/ /zhes smras te
73b1('dul ba): dang du ma blangs so/ /de na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas mnyan yod du bram ze'i khyim drug pa gnyi ga nas btul cing bzhag go /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa/ gang 'dul ba'i dus yin snyam na/ mnyan
73b2('dul ba): yod na bram ze zhig 'dug pa de'i chung ma gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa yin te/ bram ze des me tog dang / yam sreg shing gi phyir phyi rol tu byung ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas
73b3('dul ba): bsam pa/ bram ze de 'dul ba'i dus yin no/ /snyam nas/ de bram ze'i khyim du song ba dang / de'i chung ma des tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka sgo khang du mthong nas de'i nang du zhugs pa dang / tshe dang ldan
73b4('dul ba): pa 'char ka yang khyim gyi nang du zhugs so/ /de gnas khang du zhugs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang de'i phyi bzhin gnas khang du bzhugs so/ /de gnas khang nas phyir byung ste skas las
73b5('dul ba): khang steng du 'dzeg par brtsams pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas kyang de'i phyi bzhin skas las khang steng du 'dzeg par brtsams so/ /des skas phul ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka sa la bsgyel
73b6('dul ba): nas de 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / des bsam pa/ ma shi'am snyam nas de babs te bslang bar brtsams nas/ 'gul bar yang ma nus so/ /bram ze 'ongs nas dris pa/ 'di ci yin/
73b7('dul ba): bram ze mos rgyas par brjod pa dang / des smras pa/ khyod kyi 'di de ltar phul ba ni/ ma legs pa byas te/ 'di ni/ bram ze mdun na 'don gyi bu las rab tu byung ba/ rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi chung po
74a1('dul ba): grogs/ btsun mo phreng ldan ma'i slob dpon yin te/ 'di dag gis rgyal po las gzhon nu'i yongs su spangs pa thob pas/ bdag cag rgyal pos phyag sbal du bcug pas 'chi
74a2('dul ba): bar bya dgos pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro/ /bram ze mos tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te/ 'phags pa/ khyod kyis mi mkhyen pa dang / ma gzigs pa
74a3('dul ba): dang | ma rig pa dang / rnam par mi mkhyen pa ci yang ma mchis kyi/ bzod pa gsol zhes bzod pa gsol pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka langs te smras pa/ bzod par bya'o/ /bram ze de ngo
74a4('dul ba): mtshar skyes nas des smras pa/ btsun pa 'char ka /ci'i slad du byon/ khyod nyid 'dul ba'i don du'o/ /btsun pa 'char ka /de'i slad du 'di nyid du bzhugs te zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzod
74a5('dul ba): cig |tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas der 'dug ste zas kyi bya ba byas pa dang / bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char
74a6('dul ba): kas de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin khong du chud nas 'di ltar/ bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i
74a7('dul ba): ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to/ /des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa/ bdag gis dge ba'i
74b1('dul ba): bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char ka la brten nas btsun pa 'char kas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams
74b2('dul ba): kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyis pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag
74b3('dul ba): dang | mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni/ bskams/ rus pa'i ri dag las ni/ bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni/ bkum/ mtho ris dang / thar pa'i sgo dag ni/ phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi
74b4('dul ba): dwags dag nas ni/ rkang pa phyung / lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du ni/ bzhag /'khor ba ni/ mthar bgyis/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu
74b5('dul ba): mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/ thob ste/ btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags so/ /btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags te/ btsun
74b6('dul ba): pa| bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yi/ bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slad chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang
74b7('dul ba): bas skyabs su mchi'o/ /btsun pa 'char kas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag gi bsod snyoms dang / na bza' dang / gnas mal dang / snyung ba'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci gnang /
75a1('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ rab tu byung ba ni/ gzhan la phan pas rjes su 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas/ bram ze gzhan dag la yang phan pa bya dgos so/ /zhes
75a2('dul ba): smras te/ dang du ma blangs so/ /de na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas mnyan yod du bram ze'i khyim bdun pa gnyi ga nas btul cing bzhag go /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa/ gang 'dul ba'i
75a3('dul ba): dus yin snyam na/ /mnyan yod na bram ze zhig 'dug pa de'i chung ma gzugs bzang ba/ blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa yin te/ bram ze de me tog dang yam sreg shing gi phyir phyi rol tu byung ba dang / tshe
75a4('dul ba): dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa/ bram ze de 'dul ba'i dus yin no/ /snyam nas/ de bram ze de'i khyim du song ba dang / bram ze mo de gzugs kyi rgyags pa dang / lang tsho'i rgyags pa dang / rigs kyi
75a5('dul ba): rgyags pa dang / dbang phyug gi rgyags pas rgyags nas tshig kyang mi ster ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i sngon gyi las zad pa las bsam nas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ sring mo rnying pa zad
75a6('dul ba): byed cing / /gsar pa cung zad skyed mi byed/ /bag med brgyan pa mthong nas ni/ /mchi mas brnangs pa'i bzhin gyis du/ /zhes smras te song ngo / /bram ze mo de 'dis bdag spyos so/ /zhes gshe
75a7('dul ba): zhing de gos dri ma can gyon te/ khri zhig pa'i steng du nyal te 'dug go /bram ze de 'ongs pa dang des de mthong nas smras pa/ bram ze mo 'di ci nyes/ bram ze mos bshes te smras pa/ gal te khyod la
75b1('dul ba): gang sgo na 'greng ba'i mi gcig la yang bza' ba dang / bgo ba sbyin pa'i 'byor ba med na/ khyod la khyim mi mo blangs pas ci bya/ dge sbyong 'char ka gang yin pa des kho mo spyos so/ /bram zes
75b2('dul ba): smras pa/ bzang mo/ de ni/ bram ze mdun na 'don gyi bu las rab tu byung ba yin gyi/ de la bzod par gyis shig /bram ze mos smras pa/ gal te de gson na/ kho mo mi gson no/ /bram zes smras pa/
75b3('dul ba): bzang mo/ 'di ni/ ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi chung po grogs/ btsun mo phreng ldan ma'i slob dpon yin te/ de dag gis rgyal po las gzhon nu'i yongs su spangs pa thob pas gal te
75b4('dul ba): bdag gis de la sdug bsngal cung zad bskyed par gyur na/ bdag cag rgyal pos phyag sbal du bcug pas 'chi bar bya dgos pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur gyi/ bzod par gyis shig /bram
75b5('dul ba): ze mos smras pa/ bram ze/ mang du smras te ci rung / gal te de gson na/ kho mo mi gson no/ /'dod pa bsten pas ni/ sdig pa'i las mi bya ba ci yang med pas/ bram ze de ral gri mchan du bcug ste 'phags pa dang /
75b6('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas thag ring po kho nas de sems ji lta bus 'ong snyam na/ ji tsam na gsod pa'i sems kyis 'ong bar mthong nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas lo ma ma yin pa'i spyil bu mngon par sprul nas
75b7('dul ba): der zhugs te 'dug go / bram ze des smras pa/ btsun pa 'char ka/ sgo phye zhig /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ khyod skyes bzang pos 'ongs par gyur na/ kho bos ci'i phyir sgo mi dbye/ ral gri 'or cig /
76a1('dul ba): bram zes bsam pa/ bgags te gsad do/ /snyam nas des ral gri bor ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ sdig pa'i sems de yang 'or cig /bram ze des bsam pa/ 'di
76a2('dul ba): ni/ bdag nyid chen po zhig ste/ bdag gi sems kyang shes so/ /snyam nas de mngon par dad par gyur pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de'i phyir bsdus nas de bzhin du
76a3('dul ba): 'dug go / bram ze des tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams
76a4('dul ba): dang / rang bzhin khong du chud nas 'di ltar/ bram ze stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du
76a5('dul ba): byas pa de ltar chos bstan to/ /des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa/ bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char ka la brten nas/ btsun pa 'char ka bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta
76a6('dul ba): bu ni/ bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis kyang ma
76a7('dul ba): bgyis/ byams pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag dang / mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni/ bskams/ rus pa'i ri dag las ni/ bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni/ bkum/
76b1('dul ba): mtho ris dang / thar pa'i sgo dag ni/ phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dag nas ni/ rkang pa phyung / lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du ni/ bzhag /'khor ba ni/ mthar bgyis/ thog ma ma mchis
76b2('dul ba): pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/ thob ste/ btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags so/ /
76b3('dul ba): bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags te/ btsun pa/ bdag ni/ bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yi/ bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan
76b4('dul ba): chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dad pas skyabs su mchi'o/ /de nas bram ze des smras pa/ btsun pa/ 'char ka khyod bdag gi sdum par byon tam/ son to/ /btsun pa 'char kas bdag
76b5('dul ba): gi bram ze mo la ji skad bka' stsal/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ kho bo de la 'di skad ces/ sring mo rnying pa zad byed cing / /gsar pa cung zad skyed mi byed/ /bag med brgyan pa mthong nas ni/ /
76b6('dul ba): mchi mas brnangs pa'i bzhin gyis du/ /zhes smras so/ /btsun pa/ tshigs su bcad pa de'i don ci lags/ bram ze sngon byung ba/ 'das pa'i dus na/ ri brag cig tu dus ston byung nas de na khyim bdag
76b7('dul ba): gi chung ma rab tu mang po dag rang gi rgyan dag gis brgyan te/ skyed mos tshal gyi sar dong ba de dag grong sprang mo zhig gis mthong nas de bdag nyid rgud pa'i mya ngan byed do/ /sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med
77a1('dul ba): pa'i tshe rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang / bkren pa la rjes su snying brtse ba/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba/ bse ru lta bu gcig pu 'jig rten gyi yon gnas su gyur pa dag
77a2('dul ba): 'jig rten du byung ngo / /rang sangs rgyas shig de la phan gdags pa'i phyir phyogs der song ba dang / de'i lus mdzes pa dang / sems mdzes pa grong sprang mo des mthong nas/ des sprang zan cung zad cig
77a3('dul ba): rnyed pa dang / des bsam pa/ bdag gis sbyin gnas 'di lta bu la mchod pa ma byas pas/ des na gnas skabs 'di lta bur gyur gor ma chag gi/ gal te bcom ldan 'das 'di bdag las bsod snyoms
77a4('dul ba): cung zad len par 'gyur na/ bdag gis 'di la dbul bar bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /rang sangs rgyas des de la snying brtse ba'i phyir lhung bzed bzed pa dang / des de la phul lo/ /rang sangs rgyas de de la snying
77a5('dul ba): brtse bas ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba ltar steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas 'bar ba dang / gsal ba dang / char 'bebs pa dang / glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams
77a6('dul ba): so/ /so so'i skye bo rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod par byed pa yin pas de shing ljon pa rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rang sangs rgyas de'i rkang pa gnyis kyi drung du 'gyel nas des smon lam 'di skad
77a7('dul ba): ces/ bdag las 'di'i rnam par smin pas nam yang sdug bsngal bar ma gyur cig /ces btab bo/ /bram ze/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ grong sprang mo gang yin pa de ni/ khyod kyi chung ma de yin te/ des rang
77b1('dul ba): sangs rgyas la mchod pa byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas da ltar 'di lta bur skyes te kho bos de'i las kyi rnam par smin pa de zad pa las bsam nas de skad ces/ sring mo rnying pa zad byed cing //
77b2('dul ba): gsar pa cung zad skyed mi byed/ /bag med brgyan pa mthong nas ni/ /mchi mas brnangs pa'i bzhin gyis ngu / /zhes smras so/ /btsun pa 'char kas don gyis na bdag gi mchis brang la bskul ba mdzad do/ /
77b3('dul ba): btsun pa 'char ka sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas/ bram ze de la cang mi smra bas dang du blangs so/ /de nas bram ze des tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas cang
77b4('dul ba): mi smra bas dang du blangs par rig nas song ngo / /bram ze mo de yang 'gyod pa skyes te bdag gis bram ze 'char ka sod cig /ces mngag pa ni/ ma legs pa byas te/ bram ze des btsun pa 'char ka bsad par
77b5('dul ba): ma gyur tam snyam mo/ /bram ze des 'ongs pa dang chung mas smras pa/ rje'i sras/ khyod kyis btsun pa 'char ka ma bkrongs sam/ bram zes smras pa/ de ni/ bdag nyid chen po yin pas su zhig gis bkrongs
77b6('dul ba): par nus/ chung mas smras pa/ 'o na khyod kyis spyan ma drangs sam/ bram zes smras pa/ kho bos sang khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs kyi/ zhal zas sta gon gyis shig /bram ze mo des zhal zas
77b7('dul ba): grang cha gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ de nyid kyis nyin mo sta gon byas/ drod bag gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ phyi de nyin par sta gon byas so/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang phyi de nyin par snga dro sham thabs bgos/
78a1('dul ba): chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs te bram ze de'i khyim ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go /de nas bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pas tshe dang ldan pa
78a2('dul ba): 'char ka bde bar 'dug par rig nas/ bca' ba dang / bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byed/ stob par byed/ rnam grangs du mar bca' ba dang / bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang
78a3('dul ba): gi lag nas tshim par byas shing bstabs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas zan zos shing lag pa bsnyal/ lhung bzed bzhag par rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mdun du
78a4('dul ba): chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bram ze mo de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin khong du chud nas 'di ltar/ bram ze mo de stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin
78a5('dul ba): du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to/ /des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa/ bdag gi
78a6('dul ba): dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char ka la brten nas btsun pa 'char kas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams
78a7('dul ba): kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag dang mchi
78b1('dul ba): ma'i rgya mtsho ni/ bskams/ rus pa'i ri dag las ni/ bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni/ bkum/ mtho ris dang / thar pa'i sgo dag ni/ phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dag nas ni/ rkang pa
78b2('dul ba): phyung / lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni/ bzhag /'khor ba ni/ mthar bgyis/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du
78b3('dul ba): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/ thob ste/ btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags so/ /btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags te/ btsun pa/ bdag ni/ bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge
78b4('dul ba): slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yi/ bdag dge bsnyen mar gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/ /btsun pa 'char kas ji srid 'tsho'i
78b5('dul ba): bar du bdag gi bsod snyoms dang / na bza' dang / gnas mal dang / snyung ba'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci gnang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ rab tu byung ba ni/ gzhan la phan pas rjes su
78b6('dul ba): 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas/ bram ze gzhan pa la phan pa bya dgos so/ /zhes smras te/ dang du ma blangs so/ /de na tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas mnyan yod du bram ze khyim brgyad pa gnyi ga nas btul cing bzhag go /
78b7('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa/ gang 'dul ba'i dus yin snyam na/ mnyan yod na bram ze phyug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs su bzung ba yang sa shing rgya che ba/ ser sna can/ mig phra ba/ bya rog la yang
79a1('dul ba): gtor ma mi ster ba/ yo byad kun tu 'dzin pa zhig 'dug pa des/ ri brag cig tu zhing blas kyi mtha' rmor bcug nas/ des bang ba dag rgyas btab ste chung ma la lto rgyags tsam byin nas ri
79a2('dul ba): brag der song ste rang gi zhal lta byas nas zhing blas kyi mtha' dag byed du 'jug go/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa/ bram ze de 'dul ba'i dus yin no/ /snyam nas des bsod snyoms rgyus te bram ze de'i khyim du
79a3('dul ba): song nas des smras pa/ bram ze mo/ lhung bzed kyi chu bslang ngo / /des de la 'bras chan phul ba dang / phru ba de de bzhin du gang bar 'dug go /bram ze mos smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag gi khyim thab ser sna can/ mig
79a4('dul ba): phra ba/ bya rog la yang gtor ma mi ster ba/ yo byad kun du 'dzin pa lags kyi/ slan chad ma byon cig /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ thabs yin gyi/ sang kho bo bdag nyid dang gnyis 'ong ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa
79a5('dul ba): 'char ka phyi de nyin par bdag nyid dang gnyis der song ba dang / des de la de bzhin du 'bras chan phul lo/ /de bzhin du bdag nyid dang drug cu'i bar du nyin rer lan re song ste bram ze'i khyim der bsod snyoms
79a6('dul ba): zos pa dang / dgos kyi sdum tshes dag /shes ldan dag /ltos shig /bram ze des lag pa bcal ba brgya dag gis longs spyod dag bsgrubs na/ de dag bram ze mo des/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag dang lhan cig
79a7('dul ba): za bar byed do/ /zhes smod par byed/ 'phyar kha gtong bar byed/ kha zer bar byed do/ /bram ze'i khye'u zhig bya ba 'ga' zhig la mnyan yod nas ri brag der song ba dang / bram ze des bram ze'i khye'u de thag
79b1('dul ba): ring po kho na nas mthong nas des bram ze'i khye'u de la dris pa/ bram ze'i khye'u/ khyod ga las 'dir 'ongs/ des smras pa/ mnyan yod nas so/ /khyod kyis kho bo'i khyim gyi gtam thos sam/ thos te/ mnyan yod na khyim bdag
79b2('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim ni/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag gi khyim dang po lags so/ /mkhan po'i khyim ni/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag gi khyim gnyis pa lags te/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong drug cu nyin rer lan re
79b3('dul ba): mchis te bsod snyoms 'tshal lo/ /bram ze des bsam pa/ 'dis kho bo ser sna can la mtho 'tsham par byed kyi/ gzhan la yang dri bar bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de lam gar song ste bsdad pa dang / ji tsam na bram ze'i khye'u
79b4('dul ba): gzhan zhig bya ba 'ga' zhig la mnyan yod nas ri brag der song ba de/ bram ze des bram ze'i khye'u da thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas/ des bram ze'i khye'u de la dris pa/ bram ze'i khye'u/ khyod ga las
79b5('dul ba): 'dir 'ongs/ des smras pa/ mnyan yod nas so/ /khyod kyis kho bo'i khyim gyi gtam thos sam/ thos te/ mnyan yod na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim ni/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag gi khyim
79b6('dul ba): dang po lags so/ /mkhan po'i khyim ni/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag gi khyim gnyis pa lags te/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong drug cu nyin rer lan re mchis te bsod snyoms 'tshal lo/ /bram ze des
79b7('dul ba): bsam pa/ de dang 'di mthun pas de ltar gyur gyi/ bram ze mo des longs spyod dag zos par gyur na mi rung gi/ 'gro'o/ /snyam mo/ /de nas bram ze de phyir 'ongs te bram ze de la smras pa/ bram ze mo
80a1('dul ba): ngan pa/ kho bos lag pas gzhal ba brgya dag gis longs spyod dag bsgrubs na/ khyod de dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag dang lhan cig za bar byed dam/ khyod kyis bram
80a2('dul ba): ze rig byed gsum dang ldan pa dag ma mthong ngam/ ci na/ dge sbyong mgo reg de dag la sbyin par byed ces des de brdeg par brtsams pa dang / des smras pa/ bram ze/ khyod kyis kho mo la gtad
80a3('dul ba): pa'i bang ba dag kho mos rgya nyams par byas sam ci/ je so sor rtogs shig /bram ze des bang ba dag so sor brtags pa dang ji tsam na de bzhin du rgya ma nyams par 'dug pa dag mthong
80a4('dul ba): nas des chung ma la smras pa/ khyod kyi zas de snyed ga las rnyed/ des smras pa/ bdag gi phru ba 'dir 'bras chan dang / sran tshod btsos na/ 'bras chan des/ dge sbyong drug cu dang bdag kyang 'grangs
80a5('dul ba): par gyur to/ /bram ze des smras pa/ ci'i phyir de ltar du gyur/ des smras pa/ bdag gis khyod kyi mngon sum du 'gyur bar bya'o/ /zhes des phyi de nyin par tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bdag nyid dang drug
80a6('dul ba): cu der 'ongs pa la de bzhin du bsod snyoms phul nas des smras pa/ bram ze/ khyod kyis mthong ngam/ bram ze de mngon par dad par gyur nas/ des smras pa/ btsun pa 'char kas sang bdag gi sdum
80a7('dul ba): par gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ bram ze/ ci/ 'di 'dra bas sam/ 'on te zas yang dag pas mgron du 'bod/ bshos yang dag pas spyan 'dren
80b1('dul ba): to/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bram ze de la cang mi smra bas dang du blangs te song ngo / /de nas bram ze des tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas cang mi smra bas dang du blangs par rig nas/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo bca' ba dang /
80b2('dul ba): bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa dag sta gon byas so/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang phyi de nyin par snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te bram ze'i khyim ga la ba der song ste phyin
80b3('dul ba): nas stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go / de nas bram ze de tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bde bar 'dug par rig nas/ bca' ba dang / bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byed /
80b4('dul ba): stob par byed do/ /rnam grangs du mar bca' ba dang / bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byas shing bstabs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka zan zos shing lag pa bsnyal/ lhung bzed
80b5('dul ba): bzhag par rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang
80b6('dul ba): rang bzhin khong du chud nas 'di ltar/ bram ze de chung ma dang bcas pas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rje bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i
80b7('dul ba): 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to/ /des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa/ bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char ka la brten nas btsun pa 'char kas bdag
81a1('dul ba): la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi pha mes dag gis
81a2('dul ba): kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag dang / mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni/ bskams/ rus pa'i
81a3('dul ba): ri dag las ni/ bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni/ bkum/ mtho ris dang / thar pa'i sgo dag ni/ phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dag nas ni/ rkang pa phyung / lha dang / mi rnams
81a4('dul ba): kyi nang du ni/ bzhag /'khor ba ni/ mthar bgyis/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs
81a5('dul ba): pa'i 'bras bu ni/ thob ste/ btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags so/ /btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags te/ btsun pa/ bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang
81a6('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yi/ bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/ /btsun pa 'char
81a7('dul ba): kas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag gi bsod snyoms dang / na bza' dang / gnas mal dang / snyung ba'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci gnang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ rab
81b1('dul ba): tu byung ba ni/ gzhan la phan pas rjes su 'dzin pa la zhugs pa yin pas/ bram ze gzhan dag la yang phan pa bya dgos so/ /zhes smras te/ dang du ma blangs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas mnyan yod du bram
81b2('dul ba): ze khyim dgu pa gnyi nas btul cing bzhag go/ / //'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/ bam po re bdun pa/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa/ gang 'dul ba'i dus yin snyam na/ mnyan yod na bram
81b3('dul ba): ze zhig 'dug pa des/ rigs mnyam pa la chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /de la bu zhig byung nas de bsrings shing bskyed de chen por
81b4('dul ba): gyur to/ /de'i chung ma de gtum pa/ brlang pa/ rtsub pa/ rgya ba/ gshe ba/ spyo ba zhig yin pas rtag tu ngos kyi sdum tshes dag dang lhan cig 'thab krol byed nas de'i ming gtum mo/ gtum mo/ zhes bya bar gyur
81b5('dul ba): to| |dus gzhan zhig na mnyan yod du dus ston byung nas bram ze des bu la smras pa/ bu/ khyod kyi ma 'di gtum pas gzhan dag dang lhan cig 'thab krol byed pas bdag cag khri mon du bcug pas 'chi bar
81b6('dul ba): bya dgos pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur gyi/ re zhig dus ston thal gyi bar du ri brag gzhan zhig tu 'dong zhing 'khod la/ de'i 'og tu phyir 'ong bar bya'o/ /khyod song la ma la dris shig /
81b7('dul ba): bu des ma la smras pa/ yum/ bdag bgyi ba cung zhig gi slad du ri brag ga ge mo zhig tu mchi'o/ /gtum mos smras pa/ gang du kho mo'i dang po'i gos song ba der song zhig /bram zes kyang smras pa/
82a1('dul ba): kho bo yang 'gro'o/ /gtum mos smras pa/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong ba der song zhig /de gnyis dong ba dang / gtum mos bu mo mngag gzhug ma la smras pa/ bu mo/ 'khur slang tshugs
82a2('dul ba): shig dang / je snog zan bya'o/ /des 'khur slang btsugs te 'khur ba dag bya bar brtsams pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa/ gtum mo da 'dul ba'i dus yin no/ /snyam nas/ de snga dro
82a3('dul ba): sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas/ de mthar gyis bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na/ gtum mo'i khyim du 'jug par brtsams pa dang /
82a4('dul ba): de 'jug pa gtum mos mthong nas/ des bu mo mngag gzhug ma la smras pa/ bu mo/ dge slong 'di skrod cig /des bskrad pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshe dang por nang du zhugs shing / bu mo
82a5('dul ba): mngag gzhug ma phyis zhugs so/ /de gtum mos yang mthong nas/ des bu mo mngag gzhug ma la smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod kyis dge sbyong 'di ma bskrad dam/ des smras pa/ bskrad do/ /'o na 'di ga
82a6('dul ba): las zhugs/ yang skrod la sgo chod cig /des de bskrad de sgo bcad nas zhugs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ches dang por zhugs so/ /de gtum mos yang mthong nas/ des bu mo mngag gzhug ma
82a7('dul ba): la smras pa/ bu mo/ khyod kyis dge sbyong 'di bskrad de sgo ma bcad dam/ bcad do/ /'o na 'di ga nas zhugs/ de nas gtum mos smras pa/ dge sbyong ci slong / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ 'khur
82b1('dul ba): ba'o/ /gtum mos smras pa/ khyod bu thu bor gyur te 'ongs na/ khyod la 'khur ba ci'i phyir mi sbyin/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bu thu bor sprul te 'ongs pa dang / gtum mos smras pa/ gal te lag pa dang / rkang pa
82b2('dul ba): dag ser por byas kyang khyod la 'khur ba mi sbyin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas lag pa dang / rkang pa dag ser por sprul pa dang / gtum mos smras pa/ gal te mig gnyis kham phor lta bur blta na yang
82b3('dul ba): khyod la 'khur ba mi sbyin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas mig gnyis kham phor lta bur sprul pa dang / gtum mos smras pa/ gal te nam mkha' la dril bu bzhin du khral la 'khrol zhing 'dug na yang khyod
82b4('dul ba): la 'khur ba mi sbyin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas nam mkha' la dril bu bzhin du khral la 'khrol zhing 'dug pa dang / gtum mos smras pa/ gal te khyod phyed phyed du dum bu gnyis su gas kyang khyod la
82b5('dul ba): 'khur ba mi sbyin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bdag nyid phyed phyed du dum bu gnyis su gas par sprul te sa la bsgyel ba dang / bu mo mngag gzhug mas smras pa/ jo mo/ khyed kyis gdung bar bgyid pa mang po
82b6('dul ba): dad bsgrubs pa de dag gi nang du 'di ni/ ches gdung bar bgyid pa lags te/ dge slong 'di ni/ ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi chung po grogs/ btsun mo phreng ldan ma'i slob dpon lags pas/ bdag ni/ shin tu thag
82b7('dul ba): ring por mchis kyang bran mo nyid du bas kyi/ jo mos ni/ gser gyi chu bum gyis rgyal po'i pho brang du chab bcu 'tsham par 'gyur ro/ /gtum mo skrag ste bsam pa/ de ltar 'gyur ro/ /snyam nas des smras pa/
83a1('dul ba): bu mo/ dong rkos shig dang sba'o/ /zhes des dong bkos ste sba bar brtsams pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka 'gog pa la snyoms zhugs nas des bsgul bar yang ma
83a2('dul ba): nus so/ /de nas gtum mos tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ 'phags pa/ khyod kyis mi mkhyen pa dang / mi gzigs pa dang / ma rig pa dang / rnam par mi mkhyen pa
83a3('dul ba): ci yang ma mchis kyi/ bdag la bzod pa mdzod cig dang / khyod la 'khur ba gsol lo/ /tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka langs te cha lugs tha mal bstan pa dang / gtum mos bsam pa/ 'di la 'khur ba sbyin no/ /
83a4('dul ba): zhes khas blangs na/ 'khur ba 'di dag ni/ ha cang che ches bas phangs kyi/ 'di'i phyir 'khur ba chung ngu gzhan zhig bya'o/ /snyam nas/ des 'khur ba chung ngu zhig sreg par brtsams pa dang / 'khur ba des
83a5('dul ba): 'khur slang thams cad yog par gyur nas gtum mos bsam pa/ bdag gi khur ba 'di/ mi sbyin par 'khur ba snga ma las gcig sbyin no/ /snyam nas des 'khur ba gcig drang bar brtsams pa dang /
83a6('dul ba): ji tsam na khur ba thams cad 'ongs nas gtum mos smras pa/ ci/ 'phags pa 'khur ba thams cad bzhed dam/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ 'dod do/ /gtum mos smras pa/ bzhes su gsol/
83a7('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ sring mo dang / gal te yongs su gtang na/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi deng sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod
83b1('dul ba): la spyan drangs kyi/ der dong la rang gi lag nas brims shig /gtum mos smras pa/ 'phags pa/ bdag gtum mo/ zhes thams cad du rig pas/ bdag der 'jug tu ga la chud/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char
83b2('dul ba): kas smras pa/ sring mo/ kho bos khyod 'jug tu gzhug go /de nas gtum mos 'khur ba de dag thogs te/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim du 'jug par brtsams pa dang / sgo bas smras pa/ gtum
83b3('dul ba): mo/ don ci'i phyir 'dir 'ongs/ ma 'jug cig /tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ bzhin bzang / 'jug tu chug cig /sgo bas gtum mo nang du btang ba dang / des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi
83b4('dul ba): dge 'dun mang po mthong nas 'khur ba de dag gtub par brtsams pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ ma gtub par rangs par brims shig /gtum mos smras pa/ khyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang
83b5('dul ba): ldan pa 'char kas smras pa/ brims shig dang khyed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes des 'di ltar sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad la khyed pa'i phyin lhag kyang byung ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs
83b6('dul ba): so/ /gtum mos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad la 'khur bas khyed par brims te gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bshad pa mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs
83b7('dul ba): so| |gtum mos smras pa/ btsun pa 'char ka khyod bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags kyi tshur gshegs/ bdag gi sdum par bzhud la khyod kyi der gdug tshod gsol cig /tshe dang ldan pa
84a1('dul ba): 'char ka gtum mo'i khyim du song ba dang / gtum mos tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la zan byin nas gtum mo tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug pa
84a2('dul ba): dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin khong du chud nas 'di ltar/ gtum mos stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i
84a3('dul ba): rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to/ /des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/ btsun pa/ bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa
84a4('dul ba): 'char ka la brten nas btsun pa 'char kas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi
84a5('dul ba): pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni/ bskams
84a6('dul ba): rus pa'i ri dag las ni/ bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni/ bkum/ mtho ris dang / thar pa'i sgo dag ni/ phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags dag nas ni/ rkang pa phyung / lha dang / mi
84a7('dul ba): rnams kyi nang du ni/ bzhag /'khor ba ni/ mthar bgyis/ thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du
84b1('dul ba): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni/ thob ste/ btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags so/ /btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags te/ btsun pa/ bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge
84b2('dul ba): 'dun la skyabs su mchi yi/ bdag dge bsnyen mar gzung du gsol/ /deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de
84b3('dul ba): la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin 'jug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas stan las langs te song ngo / /de nas gtum
84b4('dul ba): mos rang gi khyim phyag der legs par byas/ chag chag legs par btab/ byug pas legs par byugs te me tog dag dgram par byas nas spyod lam zhi bas 'dug go /bram ze de yang dus ston thal nas
84b5('dul ba): phyir 'ongs te skyed mos tshal du bsdad nas des bu la smras pa/ bu/ khyod song la khyod kyi ma khri mon gang du bcug cing 'dug pa ltos shig dang / dbyung bar bya'o/ /bu de khyim du song ba dang / gtum mos thag ring po kho na
84b6('dul ba): nas bu mthong nas des smras pa/ bu/ 'ongs pa legs so/ /'ongs pa legs so/ /tshur shog /ngal sos shig /khyod kyi pha de 'ongs sam/ bus smras pa/ mchis te/ skyed mos tshal na sdod cing mchis so/ /bu de zan zos
84b7('dul ba): nas pa'i gan du song ba dag phas dris pa/ bu/ khyim bde'am/ bus smras pa/ yab/ yum gyi spyod lam de lta bu ni/ sngon lan 'ga' yang mthong ste/ 'di ltar spyod lam zhi bas mchis so/ /bram ze de khyim du zhugs pa dang /
85a1('dul ba): gtum mos thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas des smras pa/ rje'i sras/ byon pa legs so/ /byon pa legs so/ /bzhugs su gsol/ de 'dug nas bsam pa/ bye brag 'di
85a2('dul ba): lta bu ni/ sngon ma byung na/ ci las gyur snyam nas des tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ 'di ltar sngon dang mi 'dra bar/ /log pa nyid du khyod snang na/ /khyod ni smyo byed ldan gyur tam/ /'on te myos par gyur
85a3('dul ba): tam ci/ /gtum mos tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ jo bo bdag ni smyos pa min/ myos par gyur pa'ang ma lags te/ /bdag gis sangs rgyas bstan pa la/ /'phags pa'i bden pa mthong bar bgyis/ /
85a4('dul ba): rje'i sras/ bdag la 'phags pa 'char kas 'di ltar/ bdag slan chad 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe nyon mongs pa de lta bu dag kun tu spyod par mi 'gyur ba de ltar chos bstan pa mdzad do/ /bram ze de de ngo
85a5('dul ba): mtshar skyes te bsam pa/ bdag gis brdeg pa dang / bcing ba dang / smad pas thul bar ma nus pa gang yin pa de/ btsun pa 'char kas chos bstan pas btul bas/ gang gi phyir chos bstan
85a6('dul ba): pas 'di btul ba ni/ 'phags pa 'char kas bdag la phan pa mang du mdzad do/ /'phags pa 'char kas bdag la legs pa mang du mdzad kyi/ bdag song la 'phags pa 'char ka sang khyim
85a7('dul ba): gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drang ngo / /snyam nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
85b1('dul ba): mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bram ze de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par byed/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par byed/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par byed/
85b2('dul ba): yang par rab tu dga' bar byed do/ /rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar
85b3('dul ba): mdzad nas cang mi smra'o/ /de nas bram ze de stan las langs te tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa 'char kas
85b4('dul ba): sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bram ze de la cang mi smra bas dang du blangs so/ /de nas bram ze des tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas cang mi smra bas dang du blangs
85b5('dul ba): par rig nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te song ngo / /de nas bram ze des de nyid kyi mtshan mo bca' ba dang / bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa dag sta gon byas so/ /tshe dang
85b6('dul ba): ldan pa 'char ka yang phyi de nyin par snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te bram ze de'i khyim ga la ba der song ste phyin nas stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go /de nas bram ze des tshe dang
85b7('dul ba): ldan pa 'char ka bde bar 'dug par rig nas bca' ba dang / bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byed/ stob par byed do/ /rnam grangs du mar bca' ba dang / bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod
86a1('dul ba): pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byas shing bstabs nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka zan zos shing lag pa bsnyal/ lhung bzed bzhag par rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te
86a2('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin khong du chud nas 'di ltar/ bram ze des stan de
86a3('dul ba): nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas pa de ltar chos bstan to/ /des bden pa mthong nas smras
86a4('dul ba): pa| btsun pa/ bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsun pa 'char ka la brten nas btsun pa 'char kas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni/ bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/
