194b7('dul ba): dang / mi bde bar gyur cing / 'chi ba'i dbang du gyur pa rnams la chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa dang / zas kyis tshim par byas pa des/ bdag gang yin pa dang / las gang gis 'dir skyes
195a1('dul ba): pa smros shig/ ji tsam na shing ljon pa de las tshig byung ba/ shes ldan dag/ dzam+bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams ni/ yid ches par dka' ba yin pas/ kho bo su yin pa
195a2('dul ba): dang / las gang gis 'dir skyes pa yid ches par mi 'gyur bas/ ji ltar smra bar bya/ drang srong rnams kyis smras pa/ kye/ bdag cag gis mngon sum kho nar mthong na/ ji ltar yid ches par mi 'gyur/
195a3('dul ba): the tsom ma za bar smros shig/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag/ gal te de ltar na/ nyon cig dang / kho bo gang yin pa dang / las gang gis 'dir skyes pa smra bar bya'o/ /yul ko sa la dag na grong khyer
195a4('dul ba): mnyan yod ces bya ba de na/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin zhes bya ba zhig 'dug pa de mgon med pa rnams la zas sbyin par byed nas ri brag cig na bram ze zhig 'dug pa longs spyod bsrabs
195a5('dul ba): nas des bsam pa/ mnyan yod na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'dug pa de mgon med pa rnams la zas sbyin par byed kyi/ de'i gan du song na/ de las cung zad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /
195a6('dul ba): snyam nas de de'i gan du song ba dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yang / sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol bar 'dong nas/ rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'phags
195a7('dul ba): pa na| des de mthong nas smras pa/ khyim bdag/ bdag la zas kyi mgron gyis shig/ des de la smras pa/ bram ze/ tshur shog/ rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'dong la der zo zhig/ da de dang lhan
195b1('dul ba): cig 'phags pa dang / ji tsam na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis lam gar zho'i bum pa zhig rnyed nas des de bram ze de la byin nas smras pa/ bram ze/ zho'i bum pa 'di dge 'dun la brims shig/ khyim
195b2('dul ba): bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zhal zas bsod pas tshim par byas pa dang / bram ze des kyang zho'i bum pa de dge 'dun la brims so/ /khyim bdag
195b3('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol nas khyim pa dag la zan sbyin par brtsams te/ des khyim pa gzhan dag la ni/ zas bsod pa byin/
195b4('dul ba): bram ze de la ni/ ngan pa byin pa dang / des de la smras pa/ khyim bdag/ rab tu byung ba rnams ni/ bslab pa yang dag par blangs pa yin pas/ re zhig 'di dag la ni/ bsod pa sbyin par rig na/ bdag
195b5('dul ba): cag khyim pa bslab pa yang dag par ma blangs par 'dra na/ ci'i phyir khyim pa gzhan dag la ni/ zas bsod pa byin la/ bdag la ni/ zas ngan pa sbyin/ des de la smras pa/ bram ze/ khyim pa 'di
195b6('dul ba): dag kyang bslab pa yang dag par blangs pa yin te/ 'di dag gis kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs so/ /des de la smras pa/ khyim bdag/ gal te bdag gis kyang yan lag
195b7('dul ba): brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong len na/ bdag la yang zas bsod pa sbyin nam/ des de la smras pa/ sbyin no/ /des yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs pa dang / de nas khyim bdag
196a1('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyis de zas bsod pas tshim par byas nas/ des zos te 'phags pa dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ bram ze/ yud tsam zhig
196a2('dul ba): sdod cig dang / skom 'ongs par 'gyur ro/ /des skom 'thungs te song ba dang / nyi ma nub pa'i dus la bab nas mnyan yod dang ha cang mi ring ba na ri brag cig yod pa der bram ze'i khyim zhig tu
196a3('dul ba): gnas pa dang / bram ze des de la smras pa/ bram ze/ zan zo zhig /des smras pa/ kho bos zan mi za'o/ /des smras pa/ ci'i phyir/ des smras pa/ kho bos dge sbyong go'u ta ma la yan lag brgyad dang
196a4('dul ba): ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs so/ /des de la smras pa/ bram ze/ gal te re zhig za na/ de lta na legs/ gal te mi za na/ kho bo'i khyim du gnas par mi bya'o/ /des dus ma yin par zos nas
196a5('dul ba): gso sbyong ral lo/ /ri brag na gnas pa'i bram ze gang yin pa gang gis yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs nas dral ba de ni/ kho bo yin te/ kho bos yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i
196a6('dul ba): gso sbyong blangs te thams cad ma dral na/ kho bo sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba zhig na/ kho bos yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs nas dus ma yin
196a7('dul ba): par zos te gso sbyong dral bas/ kho bo rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ shing ljon pa 'di la gnas shing / de'i phyir kho bo la rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis/ lha'i
196b1('dul ba): bu rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba/ gso sbyong ral zhes bya bar shes so// //'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/ bam po don gsum pa/ drang srong de dag mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te smras pa/ shes ldan
196b2('dul ba): dag / bdag cag drang srong rnams kyis dus 'di srid du brtul zhugs la gnas pas kyang / 'di'i 'bras bu cir 'gyur mi shes na/ lha'i bu gso sbyong ral ba 'dis/ bram zer gyur pa na yan lag
196b3('dul ba): brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs shing / de bral na yang 'di rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes kyi/ bdag cag kyang gang du 'dis yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs pa der
196b4('dul ba): 'dong ngo / /de ltar bya'o/ /zhes de dag gis gros byas te mnyan yod du 'phags nas ji tsam na mthar gyis ko'u sham+b+hir phyin pa dang / khyim bdag gdangs can gyi sbyin pa'i zhal ta byed pa'i mi rnams
196b5('dul ba): kyis de dag mthong nas de dag gis khyim bdag gdangs can la sbran pa/ khyim bdag/ khyod kyis bdag cag la bsgo ba/ sngon ma byung ba'i rtags dang / cha lugs can dag mthong na/ kho bo la sbron
196b6('dul ba): cig / ces byung ba de dag lhags te sgo na sdod do/ /des smras pa/ 'jug tu chug cig /de dag gis 'jug tu bcug pa dang / khyim bdag gdangs can gyis de dag mthong nas dris pa/ shes
196b7('dul ba): ldan dag / khyed cag gang nas 'ongs/ de dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag /lho lam nas so/ /des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /khyod kyis lho lam du ngo mtshar mthong ba dang / thos pa ci yod/ de
197a1('dul ba): dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag /re zhig bdag cag gis sngar mthong ba dang / thos pa'i ngo mtshar gzhan dag lta zhog gi /te bor mthong ba dang / thos pa'i ngo mtshar gang
197a2('dul ba): yin pa dag smra bar bya'i/ nyon cig /des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /smros shig dang kho bo ngo mtshar de dag nyan to/ /de dag gis khyim bdag gdangs can la ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par brjod pa
197a3('dul ba): dang / khyim bdag gdangs can gyis thos nas mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te/ de dag la zan byin nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag /gang du 'dong / de dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag mnyan yod du
197a4('dul ba): 'dong ngo / /shes ldan dag /de na ci yod/ khyim bdag /lha'i bu gso sbyong ral gyis gang la brten te yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs pa'i khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yod
197a5('dul ba): do| |des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /gal te de ltar na/ de kho bo'i yang ma mthong ba'i grogs yin gyi/ 'di nyid du dbyar gyi mtshan mo gyis la dbyar 'das nas kho bo dang lhan cig 'dong ngo / /de
197a6('dul ba): dag de nyid du dbyar gyi mtshan mo gnas te dbyar 'das nas mnyan yod du 'phags pa dang / khyim bdag gdangs can gyis bad sa'i rgyal po shar pa la smras pa/ lha/ bdag mnyan yod du
197a7('dul ba): bgyi ba cung zhig mchis na/ gal te lhas gnang na/ der mchi'o/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag /gal te de ltar na/ song la khyod kyis don sgrub pa byas nas myur du phyir shog cig /de
197b1('dul ba): rgyal pos gnang nas drang srong lnga brgya po de dag dang lhan cig 'phags te mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas skyed mos tshal na sdod cing 'dug go / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis khyim bdag gdangs
197b2('dul ba): can 'dir 'ongs te skyed mos tshal na sdod cing 'dug go / zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang des bsam pa/ bdag gis khyim bdag gdangs can ma tshor ba kho nar gnas su 'jug tu gzhug pa ni/ bdag gi tshul
197b3('dul ba): dang mthun pa ma yin gyi/ bkur sti chen pos 'jug tu gzhug go /snyam nas/ des de bkur sti chen pos 'jug tu bcug ste lam gyis dub pa'i ngal bsos nas zan byin no/ /de nas drang srong de dag lhags
197b4('dul ba): nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis 'ongs pa legs so/ /zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kun tu spyad de smras pa/ shes ldan dag /khyed cag gi las 'ongs/ 'dir ci la 'ongs/ de dag gis smras pa
197b5('dul ba): khyim bdag / khyod kyis lha'i bu gso sbyong ral la gang byin pa de bdag cag la yang byin cig /des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /mi dran no/ /khyim bdag /bdag cag gis khyod la dran par bya'o/ /shes
197b6('dul ba): ldan dag/ legs so/ /de dag gis dran par byas nas des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /ci/ kho bo las len tam/ 'on te bcom ldan 'das las len/ khyim bdag /khyod kyis su las blangs/
197b7('dul ba): shes ldan dag /bcom ldan 'das las so/ /khyim bdag /gal te de ltar na/ bdag cag kyang de kho na las len to/ /shes ldan dag /legs kyi/ de ltar gyis shig /ces des de dag khrid de
198a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo / /de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i mdun na chos ston cing bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag
198a2('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin thag ring po kho na nas gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong
198a3('dul ba): ngam/ btsun pa/ mthong ngo / /dge slong dag /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di skyes dang bcas pas 'ongs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes ni/ 'di ltar/ gdul ba'i skyes lta bu gzhan
198a4('dul ba): med do/ /de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin drang srong lnga brgya'i 'khor dang bcas pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /mtha'
198a5('dul ba): gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ drang srong lnga brgya po 'di dag bcom ldan 'das las yan lag brgyad dang
198a6('dul ba): ldan pa'i gso sbyong len par 'tshal na/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di dag ci nas kyang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi ba dang / dge bsnyen nyid du 'tshal
198a7('dul ba): bar 'gyur ba de ltar chos bstan du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong lnga brgya po de dag gis bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas
198b1('dul ba): gang thos nas drang srong lnga brgya po de dag gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bstan par mdzad do/ /de dag
198b2('dul ba): gis bden pa mthong nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te gsol ba/ btsun pa/ bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / rdzogs par bsnyen pa
198b3('dul ba): dge slong gi dngos po 'thob cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la dge slong tshur shog ces pas rab tu dbyung gi /dge slong dag /tshur shog
198b4('dul ba): tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig / ces bka' stsal pa dang / de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'i 'jug kho nar skra byi ba dang / snam sbyar gyon par gyur te/ skra dang kha spu zhag bdun skyes pa tsam dang / lag pa
198b5('dul ba): lhung bzed dang / bya ba bum gyis 'brel ba dang / dge slong rdzogs par bsnyen nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to/ /yang smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal
198b6('dul ba): pas/ /skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing / /mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te/ /sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la gdams ngag
198b7('dul ba): byin nas de dag gis spro ba dang / 'bad pa dang / brtsal ba dag gis nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas shing / dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags
199a1('dul ba): dang bral ba/ bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan+dan bzhag pa lta bu rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur
199a2('dul ba): cing / rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa dang / srid pa dang / 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i
199a3('dul ba): lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to/ /de nas khyim bdag gdangs can bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
199a4('dul ba): zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag gdangs can la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis
199a5('dul ba): yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad cing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
199a6('dul ba): 'das rnams kyi dus sngar mdzad pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i bka' mchid dang / tshul khrims kyi bka' chid dang / mtho ris kyi bka' mchid
199a7('dul ba): dang / 'dod pa rnams kyi ro myang ba'i nyes dmigs dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / nges par 'byung ba dang / rab tu dben pa'i phan yon dang / rnam par byang ba'i
199b1('dul ba): phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos dag rgya cher ston par mdzad do/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis sems rangs pa dang / sems nyams bde ba dang / sems dga' ba dang / sems la sgrib pa med pa dang / yang
199b2('dul ba): dag phul gyi chos bstan ba kun shes pa'i skal pa dang ldan zhing mthu yod par gzigs pa de'i tshe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yang dag phul gyi chos bstan pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste/
199b3('dul ba): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po/ /sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam dag rgya cher ston par mdzad do/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ gos dag pa/ nag nog med pa/ kha bsgyur du rung
199b4('dul ba): ba| tshon du bcug na/ tshon legs par 'dzin par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ khyim bdag gdangs can gyis kyang stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang /
199b5('dul ba): kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mngon par rtogs par gyur ro/ /de nas khyim bdag gdangs can chos mthong ba dang / chos thos pa dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting sleb pa dang / som
199b6('dul ba): nyi las brgal ba dang / the tshom las brgal ba dang / ston pa'i bstan pa la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bkri zhing chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thong nas stan las langs te bla gos
199b7('dul ba): phrag pa gcig tu byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags so/ /
200a1('dul ba): btsun pa/ bdag ni/ mngon par zhugs pa lags te/ btsun pa/ bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yi/ bdag dge
200a2('dul ba): bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas mngon par dad pas skyabs su mchi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gdangs can la bka' stsal pa/ khyim
200a3('dul ba): bdag / khyod kyi ming ci/ btsun pa/ bdag nor bzang zhes bgyi ba las/ rgyal po shar pas bdag gdangs las btsal ba las/ de'i slad du bdag skye bo dag gis khyim bdag gdangs can zhes
200a4('dul ba): bgyi bar 'tshal to/ /bcom ldan 'das ko'u sham+b+hir gshegs par gsol/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' dang / bsod
200a5('dul ba): snyoms dang / gnas mal dang / snyung ba'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad dag gis bsnyen bkur 'tshal lo/ /khyim bdag /ko'u sham+b+hi na/ gtsug lag khang yod dam/ btsun pa/ ma mchis so/ /khyim
200a6('dul ba): bdag / dge slong dag ni/ gang na gtsug lag khang yod pa der bgrod pa dang / 'gro ba dang / gnas par sems so/ /bcom ldan 'das gshegs su gsol dang / bdag gis ji ltar ko'u sham+b+hi
200a7('dul ba): na| gtsug lag khang mchis par 'gyur ba dang / dge slong rnams kyang bgrod pa dang / mchi ba dang / gnas par sems par 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gdangs
200b1('dul ba): can la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas khyim bdag gdangs can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom
200b2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song nas de la mnyan yod na bya ba'am/ byed pa ci yod pa de thams cad byas shing / bsgrubs nas yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs
200b3('dul ba): gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la grogs dge slong 'ga' zhig stsol cig dang / bdag gis de dang lhan cig bcom ldan
200b4('dul ba): 'das kyi slad du gtsug lag khang rtsig tu stsal bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gdangs can 'khor dang bcas pa dang / ko'u sham+b+hi na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dag /dge slong gang
200b5('dul ba): gi gdul ba yin snyam du dgongs na/ dge slong skul byed chen po'i gdul ba yin par gzigs nas de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen po la bka' stsal pa/ skul byed/ khyim bdag
200b6('dul ba): gdangs can 'khor dang bcas pa dang / ko'u sham+b+hi na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la soms shig /tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen pos bcom ldan 'das las cang mi smra pas dang du blangs so/ /de nas tshe dang
200b7('dul ba): ldan pa skul byed chen po de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/ /mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la
201a1('dul ba): r gyus nas zas kyi bya ba byas te phyi ma'i zas kyi bsod snyoms las phyir log pas ji ltar longs spyod pa'i gnas mal mkhos su phab ste lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas khyim
201a2('dul ba): bdag gdangs can dang 'grogs te ko'u sham+b+hi ga la ba de logs su song nas mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba na/ ko'u sham+b+hir phyin to/ /de nas khyim bdag gdangs can ko'u sham+b+hir ma zhugs pa kho nar kun
201a3('dul ba): dga' ra ba nas kun dga'i ra bar dang / skyed mos tshal nas skyed mos tshal du dang / tshal nas tshal du dang / gol bar song ste/ gang du bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang rtsig tu gzhug
201a4('dul ba): ba'i sa phyogs/ ko'u sham+b+hi nas ha cang yang mi ring / ha cang yang mi nye ba/ nyin mo rgyun lugs nyung zhing blag cor chung ba/ mtshan mo sgra chung zhing 'ur sgra chung ba/ sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / rlung dang
201a5('dul ba): nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyi reg pa nyung ba de lta bu ci yod ces btsal na/ khyim bdag gdangs can gyis rang gi kun dga' ra ba ko'u sham+b+hi nas ha cang yang mi ring / ha cang yang mi nye ba/ nyin mo rgyun
201a6('dul ba): lugs nyung zhing blag cor chung ba/ mtshan mo sgra chung zhing 'ur sgra chung ba/ sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyi rag pa nyung bar mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang 'di snyam
201a7('dul ba): du sems te/ sa phyogs 'di bzang gi/ 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang rtsig tu gzhug go /snyam mo/ /de nas khyim bdag gdangs can dang / tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen
201b1('dul ba): pos skyed mos tshal der/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang rta babs mthon po dang ldan pa/ skar khung dang / skar khung zlum po dang / lan kan gyis brgyan pa zhig rtsig tu bcug go /de nas gtsug
201b2('dul ba): lag khang byas shing zin nas khyim bdag gdangs can gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'phags pa/ bcom ldan 'das shul du gshegs pa'i dgongs kyi tshad ji tsam/
201b3('dul ba): khyim bdag /'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dang 'dra'o/ /'phags pa/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i ji tsam/ khyim bdag /'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po lam du 'gro
201b4('dul ba): ba'i dgongs mal ni/ rgyang grags bcu'o/ /khyim bdag gdangs can gyis rgyang grags bcu bcur gshegs dgongs dag gshom du bcug nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pho nya btang ste/ bcom
201b5('dul ba): ldan 'das ko'u sham+b+hir gshegs su gsol/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gnas mal dang / snyung
201b6('dul ba): ba'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad dag gis bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol to/ /pho nyas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun
201b7('dul ba): dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ song la dge slong rnams la/ dge slong dag /bcom ldan 'das bad sa dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyi/ khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs
202a1('dul ba): pa dang thabs cig tu bad sa dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des/ chos gos dag longs shig /ces sgos shig /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ btsun pa/ bka' bzhin
202a2('dul ba): 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge slong rnams la/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /bcom ldan 'das bad sa dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyi/ khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs
202a3('dul ba): pa dang thabs cig bad sa dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos dag longs shig / ces bsgo'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba dang ldan pa/ zhi ba 'khor zhi ba dang
202a4('dul ba): ldan pa/ grol ba 'khor grol ba dang ldan pa/ dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa dang ldan pa/ thul ba 'khor thul ba dang ldan pa/ dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa dang ldan pa/ 'dod
202a5('dul ba): chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa/ mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ khyu mchog ltar ba lang gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ glang po che ltar glang po
202a6('dul ba): che'i phru gu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ seng+ge ltar mche ba can gyis tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar ngang pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ nam mkha' lding
202a7('dul ba): ltar bya'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ bram ze ltar slob ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ sman pa mkhas pa ltar nad pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ dpa' bo ltar ru ba'i tshogs
202b1('dul ba): kyis yongs su bskor ba/ sa mkhan ltar lam du zhugs pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ ded dpon ltar tshong pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ tshong pa ltar 'khor gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor
202b2('dul ba): ba| mkhar gyi rgyal po ltar blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ 'khor los bsgyur ba ltar bu stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ zla ba ltar rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ nyi ma ltar 'od
202b3('dul ba): zer stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ yul 'khor srung ltar dri za'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ 'phags skyes po ltar grul bum gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ mig mi bzang ltar klu'i tshogs
202b4('dul ba): kyis yongs su bskor ba/ gnod sbyin ltar gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ thag bzang ris ltar lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ brgya byin ltar sum cu pa'i tshogs kyis
202b5('dul ba): yongs su bskor ba/ tshangs pa ltar tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ dbang po rnams shin tu dul ba/ spyod lam dang spyod pa ma 'khrugs pa/ chu gter ltar ting nge ba/ sprin ltar chu dang
202b6('dul ba): bcas pa/ glang po che'i rgyal po ltar dregs pa dang bral ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku rnam par mdzes pa/ 'od 'dom
202b7('dul ba): gang gis gzugs can brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun tu bzang ba/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye
203a1('dul ba): bar gzhag pa gsum dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ kun shes kauN+Di n+ya dang / rlangs pa dang / ming chen dang / ma 'gag pa dang / shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal
203a2('dul ba): gyi bu dang / 'od srung dang / kun dga' bo dang / nam gru la sogs pa nyan thos chen po dag dang / gzhan yang dge slong gi dge 'dun mang pos bskor te/ ko'u sham+b+hi ga la ba der rgyu zhing gshegs
203a3('dul ba): nas mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na ko'u sham+b+hir byon to/ /de nas khyim pa dag gdangs can gyis/ gtsug lag khang yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa de/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge
203a4('dul ba): 'dun dang bcas pa la phul nas/ 'di ltar/ gnas brtan dag gis kyang / bcom ldan 'das ko'u sham+b+hi na gdangs can gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /zhes mdo sde'i mtha' nye bar
203a5('dul ba): sbyar to/ /de nas khyim bdag gdangs can bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la gtsug lag khang phul nas dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba skyes te rang gi khyim du
203a6('dul ba): song ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go
203a7('dul ba): / mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ gang dang ldan na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang
203b1('dul ba): ldan pa rgyu ba'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba/ rdzas las
203b2('dul ba): byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che bar gdags su rung ngam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/ skul byed/ rung ste/
203b3('dul ba): skul byed/ bdun po 'di dag ni/ gang dag dang ldan na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad
203b4('dul ba): par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba/ rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba
203b5('dul ba): che ba/ rgyas pa che ba dag yin te/ bdun gang zhe na/ skul byed/ 'di la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la kun dga'i ra ba 'bul
203b6('dul ba): bar byed pa 'di ni/ skul byed/ gang dang ldan na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par
203b7('dul ba): bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba/ rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ rgyas pa
204a1('dul ba): che ba dang po yin no/ /skul byed/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas/ kun dga'i ra ba de nyid du gtsug lag khang rtsig tu 'jug pa 'di
204a2('dul ba): ni/ skul byed/ gang dang ldan na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba'
204a3('dul ba): zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba/ rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba gnyis
204a4('dul ba): pa yin no/ /skul byed/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas/ gtsug lag khang de nyid du gnas mal 'di lta ste/ khri dang / khri'u dang / stan nang tshangs can dang /
204a5('dul ba): la ba dang / sngas dang / gor bu dag 'bul bar byed pa 'di ni/ skul byed/ gang dang ldan na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi
204a6('dul ba): nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba/ rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu
204a7('dul ba): 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba gsum pa yin no/ /skul byed/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas/ gtsug lag khang de nyid du
204b1('dul ba): gtan gyi rkyen ris rjes su mthun pa'i mchong sbyin 'bul bar byed pa 'di ni/ skul byed/ gang dang ldan na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi nyal
204b2('dul ba): ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba/ rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan
204b3('dul ba): yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba bzhi pa yin no/ /skul byed/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas/ glo bur du 'ongs pa dang / 'gro bar chas pa/ sbyin pa sbyin
204b4('dul ba): par byed pa 'di ni/ skul byed/ gang dang ldan na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig
204b5('dul ba): mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba/ rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba lnga pa yin no/ /
204b6('dul ba): skul byed/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas/ nad pa dang nad g.yog la sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa 'di ni/ skul byed/ gang dang ldan na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
204b7('dul ba): kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar
205a1('dul ba): skye ba/ rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba drug pa yin no/ /skul byed/ gzhan yang rigs
205a2('dul ba): kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas/ rlung langs pa'am/ yul ngan byung ba'am/ char bab pa'am/ lhags pa byung ba gang dag yin pa de lta bu'i rlung langs pa'am/ yul ngan byung
205a3('dul ba): ba'am/ char bab pa'am/ lhags pa byung ba'i tshe dge 'dun la 'bras can dag gam/ skyo ma dag gam/ thug pa'i btung ba dag bskyal te/ 'dis 'phags pa 'di dag lus mi brlan pa dang /
205a4('dul ba): chos gos mi gsher ba dang / longs spyod na bde ba la reg par 'gyur ro/ /snyam pas 'bul bar byed pa 'di ni/ skul byed/ gang dang ldan na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa
205a5('dul ba): rgyu ba'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba/ rdzas las byung
205a6('dul ba): ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba bdun pa yin no/ /skul byed/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rdzas
205a7('dul ba): las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi bdun po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i bsod nams sam/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu'am/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'di tsam mo/ /zhes
205b1('dul ba): bsod nams kyi tshad gzung bar mi nus te/ 'di ltar/ bsod nams mang ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /skul byed/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gang du chu klung chen
205b2('dul ba): po lnga po 'di lta ste/ gang+gA dang / ya mun dang / sa ra yu dang / gnas can dang / ma hi zhes bya ba tha mi dad par 'bab par 'gyur ba de la ni/ chu'am/ chu'i bum pa'am/ chu'i bum pa brgya phrag gam/
205b3('dul ba): chu'i bum pa stong phrag gam/ chu'i bum pa 'bum phrag 'di snyed yod do/ /zhes chu'i tshad gzung bar mi nus so/ /skul byed/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rdzas las
205b4('dul ba): byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi bdun po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i bsod nams sam/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu'am/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang 'di tsam mo/ /zhes bsod
205b5('dul ba): nams kyi tshad gzung bar mi nus te/ 'di ltar/ bsod nams mang ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la
205b6('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa/ gang dang ldan na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi nyal
205b7('dul ba): ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba/ rdzas las byung ba ma lags pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin
206a1('dul ba): tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba gdags su rung ngam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/ skul byed/ rung ste/ skul byed/ bdun
206a2('dul ba): po 'di dag ni/ gang dang ldan na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba'
206a3('dul ba): zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba/ rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa
206a4('dul ba): che ba dag yin te/ bdun gang zhe na/ skul byed/ 'di la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos grong tshigs
206a5('dul ba): ga ge mo zhig na nye bar brten cing bzhugs pa thos shing / thos nas kyang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po/ /dge ba/ nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par byed pa 'di ni/ skul byed/
206a6('dul ba): gang dang ldan na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon
206a7('dul ba): par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba/ rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba
206b1('dul ba): dang po yin no/ /skul byed/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de nyid tshur gshegs par rtsol bar
206b2('dul ba): thos shing / thos nas kyang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po/ /dge ba/ nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par byed pa 'di ni/ skul byed/ gang dang ldan na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
206b3('dul ba): dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba/
206b4('dul ba): rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba gnyis pa yin no/ /skul byed/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi
206b5('dul ba): bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de nyid shul du zhugs pa thos shing / thos nas kyang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po/ /dge
206b6('dul ba): ba| nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par byed pa 'di ni/ skul byed/ gang dang ldan na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi nyal
206b7('dul ba): ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba/ rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu
207a1('dul ba): 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba gsum pa yin no/ /skul byed/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas/ de bzhin
207a2('dul ba): gshegs pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de nyid grong tshigs de nyid du byon par thos shing / thos nas kyang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba chen po/ /dge ba/ nges par 'byung ba
207a3('dul ba): dang ldan pa thob par byed pa 'di ni/ skul byed/ gang dang ldan na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi
207a4('dul ba): 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba/ rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon
207a5('dul ba): che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba bzhi pa yin no/ /skul byed/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan
207a6('dul ba): thos de nyid la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro zhing / mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po/ /dge ba/ nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par byed pa 'di ni/
207a7('dul ba): skul byed/ gang dang ldan na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba'
207b1('dul ba): zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba/ rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba lnga pa yin
207b2('dul ba): no| |skul byed/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de nyid kyi drung nas chos tshangs par spyod pa/
207b3('dul ba): thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ yang dag par rab tu ston pa nyan
207b4('dul ba): cing thos nas kyang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po/ dge ba/ nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par 'di ni/ skul byed/ gang dang ldan na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang
207b5('dul ba): ldan pa rgyu ba'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba/ rdzas las
207b6('dul ba): byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba drug pa yin no/ /skul byed/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyang bu mo dad pa dang
207b7('dul ba): ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de nyad kyi drung nas chos thos nas sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro/ chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro zhing / bslab ba'i
208a1('dul ba): gzhi dag len par byed pa 'di ni/ skul byed/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun
208a2('dul ba): mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' zhig nye bar skye ba/ rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan
208a3('dul ba): yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba bdun pa yin no/ /skul byed/ rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi bdun po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu
208a4('dul ba): mo dad pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams sam/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu'am/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni/ 'di tsam mo/ /zhes bsod nams kyi tshad gzung bar mi nus te/ 'di
208a5('dul ba): ltar/ bsod nams mang ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /skul byed/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gang du chu klung chen po lnga po 'di lta ste/ gang+gA dang / ya mu na
208a6('dul ba): dang / sa ra yu dang / gnas can dang / ma hi zhes bya ba dag tha mi dad par 'bab par 'gyur ba de la ni/ chu'am/ chu'i bum pa'am/ chu'i bum pa brgya phrag gam/ chu'i bum pa stong phrag
208a7('dul ba): gam/ chu'i bum pa 'bum phrag 'di snyed cig yod do/ zhes chu'i tshad gzung bar mi nus te/ 'di ltar/ chu mang ba'i phyir chu'i phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /skul byed/
208b1('dul ba): de bzhin du rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi bdun po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams sam/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu'am/
208b2('dul ba): bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang 'di tsam mo/ /zhes tshad gzung bar mi nus te/ 'di ltar/ bsod nams mang ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /bcom
208b3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/ ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /mi dang ri dwags tshogs kyis bsten pa yi/ /chu klung tha
208b4('dul ba): dad 'bab par gyur pa dag / mtsho mchog bkra shis gtsang ma ngogs bde ba/ /rin chen 'byung gnas rgya mtshor 'bab pa ltar/ /de bzhin bsod nams rgyun kyang rnam kun tu/ /sbyin bdag gos sbyin
208b5('dul ba): zas skom sbyin pa dang / /mal cha stan dang gding sbyin mi la 'bab/ /chu klung chu 'bab rgya mtshor ji bzhin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen po
208b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rang ste mngon par bstod do/ /de nas khyim bdag gdangs can ni/ dad pa dang ldan la/ de'i 'khor ni/ ma dad nas des bsam pa/ bdag gi 'khor 'di
208b7('dul ba): ma dad na/ bdag gi gtsug lag khang du ji ltar spyod pa byed brtag go /snyam nas/ des cha lugs mi mngon par byas te sham thabs dma' bar bgos nas gtsug lag khang du song ste tshigs
209a1('dul ba): su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal nas gtsug lag khang du 'jug par brtsams pa dang / rgan zhugs shig sgo khang na 'dug nas des de'i rkang pa la phyag
209a2('dul ba): 'tshal te smras pa/ 'phags pa/ gtsug lag khang snying dang / mig 'phrog par bgyid pa/ mtho ris kyi them skas su gyur pa 'di su'i lags/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag gdangs can gyi'o/ /'phags
209a3('dul ba): pa| ci/ 'di gtsug lag khang lags sam/ 'on te phongs pa lags/ bzhin bzang / gtsug lag khang ni/ ji lta bu/ phongs pa ni/ ji lta bu/ 'phags pa/ gang na yo byad phun sum tshogs pa ni/
209a4('dul ba): gtsug lag khang lags la/ gang na yo byad ma mchis pa ni/ phongs pa lags so/ /bzhin bzang / 'di phongs pa yin no/ /ji ltar gyur/ khyim bdag de ni/ dad pa dang ldan pa yin na/ de'i
209a5('dul ba): 'khor ma dad pas mkho ba mi stob bo/ /'di ltar/ khyim bdag de la bu mo mngag gzhug ma mgu byed ces bya ba/ dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can zhig yod na/ 'on kyang de
209a6('dul ba): khyim de na dbang med de/ gal te de la dbang yod par gyur na/ de dge slong rnams la mkho ba stob par byed pas 'di gtsug lag khang du 'gyur ro/ /khyim bdag gdangs can gyis bsam pa/
209a7('dul ba): da ltar bdag gson pa nyid na yang bdag gi gtsug lag khang na dge slong rnams kyi gnas skabs 'di 'dra na/ bdag shi na ci 'dra bar 'gyur snyam du rig nas dge slong de'i rkang pa la phyag
209b1('dul ba): 'tshal te rang gi khyim du song nas nang mi rnams la smras pa/ khyed cag las/ gang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed par spro ba des tshul bzhin longs shig /de'i tshe na
209b2('dul ba): mgu byed bum pa thogs te chu bcu ba'i phyir byung ba dang / des der ras ma zhig rnyed nas bcom ldan 'das kyang de la phan gdags pa'i slad du phyogs der gshegs pa dang / des bcom ldan 'das
209b3('dul ba): la brtag par brtsams so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyis na bza' chos gos kyi gra rdol bar de la bstan pa dang / des bsam pa/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi ras ma 'di
209b4('dul ba): bzhes su gnang na/ bdag gis 'di bcom ldan 'das la dbul lo/ /snyam mo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i sems thugs kyis mkhyen nas bka' stsal pa/ mgu byed/ gal te khyod kyis yongs
209b5('dul ba): su btang na/ phul cig /des bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad par byas nas gus pa bskyed de phul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de de nyid kyi mdun du na bza' chos gos kyi gra glan te
209b6('dul ba): btsems pa dang kha dog mthun par gyur to/ /de dad pa skyes nas zhabs gnyis la gtugs te smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bran mor ma gyur cig /dbul bar ma gyur cig /
209b7('dul ba): ces smras nas bum ba chus bkang ste khyim du song ngo / /khyim bdag gdangs can gyis nang mi la tshul bzhin brims pa dang / mgu byed kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag /'di ci lags/ gdangs
210a1('dul ba): can gyis smras pa/ mgu byed/ khyed cag las/ gang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed par spro ba des tshul shing longs shig dang / kho
210a2('dul ba): bo la longs spyod rgya chen po dag yod do/ /des myur ba myur bar chu'i bum pa bzhag ste tshul shing blangs nas smras pa/ bdag sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bgyid par
210a3('dul ba): spro ste/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur bgyi yi/ khyod thugs las chung ngur mdzod cig /ces des sangs rgyas la
210a4('dul ba): sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs te gus par bsnyen bkur bya bar brtsams so/ /khyim bdag gdangs can gyis yang cha lugs mi mngon par byas te sham
210a5('dul ba): thabs dma' bar bgos nas gtsug lag khang du song ste tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal nas gtsug lag khang du 'jug par brtsams pa dang / yang rgan
210a6('dul ba): zhugs gzhan zhig sgo khang na 'dug nas des de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/ 'phags pa/ gtsug lag khang snying dang / mig 'phrog par bgyid pa/ mtho ris kyi them skas su gyur
210a7('dul ba): pa 'di su'i lags/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag gdangs can gyi'o/ /'phags pa/ ci/ 'di gtsug lag khang lags sam/ 'on te phongs pa lags/ bzhin bzang / gtsug lag
210b1('dul ba): khang ni/ ji lta bu/ phongs pa ni/ ji lta bu/ 'phags pa/ gang na yo byad phun sum tshogs pa ni/ gtsug lag khang lags la/ gang na yo byad ma mchis pa ni/ phongs pa lags so/ /bzhin bzang / 'di
210b2('dul ba): sngon ni/ phongs par gyur pa las/ da ni/ gtsug lag khang du gyur to/ /ji ltar gyur/ bzhin bzang / khyim bdag gdangs can la bu mo mngag gzhug ma mgu byed ces bya ba/ dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la
210b3('dul ba): dge ba'i bsam pa can zhig yod pa de khyim bdag des 'dir las su bskos te/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la yo byad thams cad kyis stobs shig ces bsgo nas/ da ltar
210b4('dul ba): de sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed pas/ des na/ 'di gtsug lag khang yin te/ phongs pa ma yin no/ /khyim bdag gdangs can
210b5('dul ba): gyis thos nas shin tu dga' ste khyim du song nas/ des bu mo mgu byed kyi lag tu lde mig dang / lde mig kyog po gtad nas nang mi rnams la smras pa/ khyed cag mgu byed kyis ci byin pa des
210b6('dul ba): gnas par gyis shig / ko'u sham+b+hi na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyang bsdus te smras pa/ shes ldan dag /kho bos bu mo mgu byed 'di/ bran mo las phyung ste khyim gyi bdag mor bcug
210b7('dul ba): go| zhes bsgrags so/ /dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa/ khyim bdag gdangs can rgyal po shar bas gdangs
211a1('dul ba): las 'tshal ba la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag /da ltar du ma zad de/ 'di ltar/ 'das pa'i dus na yang khyim bdag gdangs can
211a2('dul ba): 'di rgyal po shar pas gdangs las shes par gyur te/ nyon cig /dge slong dag /sngon byung ba grong khyer wA ra NA si na/ rgyal po tshangs byin zhes bya bas rgyal srid 'byor pa rgyas pa/ bde ba/ lo
211a3('dul ba): legs pa/ skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba/ 'thab mo dang / 'thab pa dang / phyi dgra dang / nang 'khrug rab tu zhi ba/ chom rkun dang / mu ge dang / nad dang bral ba/ sA lu dang / bu ram shing gi
211a4('dul ba): phreng ba dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa byed du bcug ste/ chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal pos chos kyi rgyal srid byed du bcug go /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na ltas pa dag gis lo
211a5('dul ba): bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab par lung bstan nas rgyal po tshangs byin gyis rang gi yul du dril sgrog pa byed du bcug ste phyogs su bsgo ba/ nga'i yul na gnas pa dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi dag nyon
211a6('dul ba): cig / ltas pa dag gis lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab par lung bstan gyi/ de'i phyir khyed cag las/ gang dag la lo bcu gnyis kyi zan bdog pa de dag gis ni/ 'khod par bya'o/ /gang
211a7('dul ba): dag la mi bdog pa de dag gis ni/ gzhan du 'dong bar bya zhing / lo bcu gnyis 'das nas phyir 'ong bar bya'o/ /de'i tshe na wA na NA si na khyim bdag gzungs byed ces bya ba phyug pa/ nor
211b1('dul ba): mang ba/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba zhig 'dug pa des mdzod pa bos te smras pa/ kwa'i nang rje mdzod pa/ kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa'i lo bcu gnyis kyi zan yod dam/ des
211b2('dul ba): smras pa/ jo bo/ mchis so/ /sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang / bkren pa la rjes su snying brtse ba/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba/ bse ru lta bu gcig pu
211b3('dul ba): 'jig rten gyi yon tan gnas su gyur pa dag 'jig rten du byung ngo / /ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya ljongs rgyu zhing 'dong ba na/ wA ra NA sir phyin nas de dag khyim bdag gzungs byed kyi gan du dong
211b4('dul ba): du phyin nas smras pa/ khyim bdag /khyod kyis kho bo cag rab tu byung ba lnga brgya la lo bcu gnyis su mkho ba stob par nus sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /je mdzod pa la rmas te slad kyis gsol
211b5('dul ba): lo| |zhes des mdzod pa pos te smras pa/ kwa'i nang rje mdzod pa/ kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa dang / rab tu byung ba lnga brgya po 'di dag gi lo bcu gnyis kyi zan yod dam/ des smras pa/ jo bo/ mchis so/ /khyim
211b6('dul ba): bdag gzungs byed kyis rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de dag la smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /mchis kyi/ bzhugs shig dang gsol lo/ /de dag der 'khod do/ /ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas gzhan lnga
211b7('dul ba): brgya ljongs rgyu zhing 'dong ba na/ wA ra NA sir phyin nas de dag kyang khyim bdag gzungs byed kyi gan du dong ste phyin nas smras pa/ khyim bdag /khyod kyis kho bo cag rab tu byung ba lnga brgya la lo bcu
212a1('dul ba): gnyis su mkho ba stob par nus sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag/ khyed la gsol lags na/ ci'i slad du yang sgrub par mdzad/ khyim bdag/ de dag kyang gzhan
212a2('dul ba): la/ kho bo cag kyang gzhan no/ /'phags pa dag/ je mdzod pa la rmas te slad kyis gsol lo/ /zhes des mdzod pa bos te smras pa/ kwa'i nang rje mdzod pa/ kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa dang / rab tu
212a3('dul ba): byung ba stong gi lo bcu gnyis kyi zan yod dam/ des smras pa/ jo bo/ mchis so/ /khyim bdag gzungs byed kyis rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de dag la smras pa/ 'phags pa dag/ mchis kyi/ bzhugs
212a4('dul ba): shig dang gsol lo/ /de dag kyang deng 'khod do/ /khyim bdag gzungs byed kyis sbyin pa'i khang pa rtsig tu bcug ste/ sbyin pa'i zhal ta ba'i mi dag dang spyan 'dren bskos nas/ spyan 'dren des
212a5('dul ba): nyi ma re re zhing song ste gdugs tshod la 'bod par byed do/ /spyan 'dren des khyi zhig gsos pa de/ nyi ma re re zhing spyan 'dren de dang lhan cig 'gro bar byed do/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na
212a6('dul ba): spyan 'dren de la brel ba zhig byung nas/ de je 'di bsgrubs te phyis spyan drang bar bya'o/ /snyam nas de gzhan du song ba dang khyi des de ma rnyed nas sngon goms pas rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi
212a7('dul ba): gan du song ba dang / der yang de ma mthong nas des skad phyung ngo / /rang sangs rgyas de dag gi dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gang yin pa des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag /spyan 'dren dus las
212b1('dul ba): yol nas khyi 'dis spyan drangs kyi/ tshur spyon/ bzhud do/ /de ltar bgyi'o/ /zhes de dag 'phags pa dang / spyan 'dren 'ongs te khyi des de mthong nas skad de byung bar brtsams pa dang / spyan 'dren gyis
212b2('dul ba): bsam pa/ 'dis 'di dag spyan drangs pas/ des na bdag nyid chen po 'di dag byon gor ma chag snyam du rig nas smras pa/ 'phags bdag/ khyed sus spyan drangs/ de dag gis smras pa/ bzhin bzang /
212b3('dul ba): khyi 'dis so/ /des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag /ma nongs kyi/ slad kyis kyang gang gi tshe bdag la brel ba 'ga' zhig byung ba de'i tshe na 'di nyid khyed spyan 'dren par 'gyur gyi/ khyed cag gshegs su
212b4('dul ba): gsol/ dge slong dag/ de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag gzungs byed gang yin pa de ni/ nga nyid yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na mdzod pa gang yin pa de ni/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yin no/ /de'i
212b5('dul ba): tshe de'i dus na spyan 'dren pa gang yin pa de ni/ bad sa'i rgyal po shar pa yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na/ khyi gang yin pa de ni/ khyim bdag gdangs can yin te/ khyim bdag gdangs can 'di/ de'i
212b6('dul ba): tshe yang rgyal po shar pas gdangs las shes par gyur la/ da ltar yang 'di des gdangs las shes so/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i gan du mi stong thub cig 'ongs nas/ rgyal pos de la smras
212b7('dul ba): pa/ kwa'i nang rje/ khyod su yin/ des smras pa/ lha/ bdag stong thub lags so/ /rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag /stong thub la 'tsho ba byin cig/ de dag gis de la 'tsho ba byin
213a1('dul ba): no| |gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+har byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po lha brgyad khri dang / ma ga d+ha ba'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag 'bum phrag du ma
213a2('dul ba): dang lhan cig bden pa dag la bzhag pa de'i tshe na/ des rgyal po'i khab tu dril sgrog pa byed du bcug ste bsgo ba/ rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa dang / pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang / yul tha dad pa nas
213a3('dul ba): lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs shes ldan dag nyon cig / nga'i yul du sus kyang rkun po mi bya'o/ /nga'i yul du gang rkun po byed pa de/ ngas yul med par bya zhing / brkus pa rnams kyi nor ni/
213a4('dul ba): nga rang gi mdzod dang / bang ba nas sbyin no/ /zhes bsgo'o/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gzhon nu'i dpe'i mdos btul ba de'i tshe na/ des kyang mnyan
213a5('dul ba): yod du dril sgrog pa byed du bcug ste bsgo ba/ nga'i yul du sus kyang rkun po mi bya'o/ /nga'i yul du rkun po byed pa de ngas gsad par bya zhing / brkus pa rnams kyi nor ni/ nga rang gi mdzod dang /
213a6('dul ba): bang ba nas sbyin no/ /zhes bsgo'o/ /bar du yul ma ga d+ha na gnas pa'i chom rkun pa gang dag yin pa dang / yul ko sa la na gnas pa'i chom rkun pa gang dag yin pa de dag mtshams kyi bar
213a7('dul ba): du dong ste 'khod cing / yul ma ga d+ha nas don mthun pa gang dag 'ong ba de dag kyang 'joms par byed/ yul ko sa la nas don mthun pa gang dag 'ong ba de dag kyang 'joms par byed nas/ thams
213b1('dul ba): cad du yul ma ga d+ha na 'khod pa'i chom rkun pa gang dag yin pa dang / yul ko sa la na 'khod pa'i chom rkun pa gang dag yin pa de dag mtshams kyi bar du dong ste 'khod cing / don mthun 'joms par
213b2('dul ba): byed pas/ don mthun 'gro ba dang 'ong ba rgyun chad de rgyal po'i dpya dang / lo thang mi 'du'o/ /zhes bya ba de lta bu'i sgra grags par gyur to/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying pos de thos nas/ ru gcig btang
213b3('dul ba): na| de bcom zhing rab tu bcom te phyir 'ongs so/ /de bzhin du ru gnyis pa dang / ru gsum pa btang na/ de yang bcom zhing rab tu bcom ste phyir 'ongs so/ /ji tsam na yul ma ga d+ha nas don mthun
213b4('dul ba): yul ko sa lar 'phags pa de/ chom rkun pas 'jigs pas rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs te sel ba tshol par byed nas blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha/ stong thub 'di lha'i 'tsho bas 'tsho
213b5('dul ba): na/ ci'i slad du don mthun gyi sel mi bgyid/ rgyal pos smras pa/ de 'gro la rag gi/ thongs shig/ blon po rnams kyis de bos te smras pa/ kwa'i nang rje/ khyod rgyal po'i 'tsho bas 'tsho na/ ci'i phyir rgyal
213b6('dul ba): po'i bka' bzhin mi byed/ des smras pa/ khyed kyis bsgo ba gang zhig kho bos ma byas nas de skad du spyo bar byed/ de dag gis smras pa/ don mthun 'di yul ko sa lar 'gro'o/ /'di'i sel
213b7('dul ba): gyis shig/ des smras pa/ ma nyes kyi/ de ltar bya'o/ /zhes des mda' lnga brgya pa'i dong pa gnyis thogs te shing rtar zhugs nas don mthun gyi mdun du 'phags so/ /chom rkun pa rnams kyis/
214a1('dul ba): de don mthun gyi mdun nas 'ong ba thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas de la pho nya btang ste bsgo ba/ chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon na re/ shing rta phyir zlog cig /gnod pa thob par
214a2('dul ba): gyur ta re zhes zer ro/ /des smras pa/ dpa' bo la dpa' bos yongs su spang ba byin cig /chom rkun pa'i pho nyas smras pa/ ci/ khyod gcig pu dpa' bo yin nam/ kho bo cag kyang dpa' bo yin gyi/
214a3('dul ba): phyir log cig/ de nas phan tshun mda' khar dgye bar brtsams nas des chom rkun pa'i pho nya'i gnad du bsnun nas de phyir log go/ de bzhin du chom rkun pa gnyis dang / bzhi dang / brgyad dang /
214a4('dul ba): bcu drug dang / sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / drug cu rtsa bzhi nas chom rkun pa lnga brgya'i bar dag lhags nas/ des de dag gi gnad du bsnun nas de dag phyir log go/ de bzhin du chom rkun pa gzhan
214a5('dul ba): lnga brgya lhags nas des de dag la smras pa/ ngas khyod kyi chom rkun pa lnga brgya bsad na/ khyed cag kyang srog gis 'gebs par mi 'dod dam/ phyir log cig /chom rkun pa rnams kyis smras
214a6('dul ba): pa| nged kyis gcig kyang ma sod na/ ci'i phyir nged phyir ldog /khyod kyang rung / nged kyang rung ngo / /des smras pa/ gal te khyed cag yid mi ches na/ gang dag ngas bsnun pa de dag gi go phud
214a7('dul ba): cig / de dag gis go 'bud par brtsams pa dang / gang gis ji ltar go phud pa de/ de ltar dus la bab nas/ chom rkun pa de dag/ mi 'di ni/ gnod sbyin zhig go/ zhes byer te dong
214b1('dul ba): ngo| |stong thub mtshams kyi bar na 'dug cing / de don mthun yul ko sa la nas 'ong ba gang yin pa de'i sel yang byed/ yum ma ga d+ha nas 'ong ba gang yin pa de'i sel yang byed do/ /des bsam
214b2('dul ba): pa| bdag gis ci'i phyir phar 'gro tshur 'gro bya/ 'di nyid du 'dug par bya'o/ /snyam nas des khyim brtsigs te 'dug nas don mthun gnyi ga'i bsti gnas su'ang gyur te/ 'brog na gnas pa yin
214b3('dul ba): pas/ 'brog gnas/ 'brog gnas zhes bya ba'i ming du gyur to// //'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/ bam po don bzhi pa/ 'brog gnas su don mthun dag lhags nas kha cig gis ni/
214b4('dul ba): 'bras btsong bar brtsams so/ /kha cig gis ni/ phye btsong bar brtsams/ kha cig gis ni/ be reg /kha cig gis ni/ khu ba/ kha cig gis ni/ ri lu btsong bar brtsams so/ /chang tshong dag gis kyang
214b5('dul ba): chang btsong bar brtsams te/ de nyid du 'khod nas der tshong 'dus chags par gyur to/ /'brog gnas kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la 'phrin yig/ lha/ bdag gis 'dir tshong 'dus btsugs
214b6('dul ba): kyi| lhas 'dir zhal lta ba gtang ba'i rigs so/ /zhes spring ngo / /rgyal pos bsam pa/ gang du bdag gi ru gsum bcom zhing rab tu bcom zhing 'ongs pa der des tshong 'dus btsugs pas/ de ni/ de
214b7('dul ba): nyid kyir gyur cig/ snyam nas/ des de la 'phrin yig/ ngas tshong 'dus de khyod la byin gyi/ der dpya dang lo thang ci 'du ba de dag khyod nyid ci dgar spyod cig /ces spring ngo / /'brog gnas su tshong 'dus
215a1('dul ba): btsugs nas 'brog gnas/ 'brog gnas zhes bya ba'i ming du gyur to/ /'brog gnas na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyis bsam pa/ shes ldan dag /
215a2('dul ba): bdag cag gang cung zad bde bar gnas pa gang yin pa de thams cad 'brog gnas kyi mthu yin pas/ bdag cag gis 'di la phan pa cung zad bya gor ma chag go/ snyam mo/ /de na kha cig gis
215a3('dul ba): smras pa/ ma nyes kyi/ de bzhin bya'o/ /ci zhig bya/ de na kha cig gis smras pa/ bdag cag las/ gang su yang rung ba bag ma gtong ba'am/ bag ma len pa des/ de 'khor dang bcas pa la zan sbyin
215a4('dul ba): zhing / gos phrugs re yang bskon par bya'o/ /ma nyes kyi/ de ltar bya'o/ /zhes de dag las/ gang bag ma gtong ba'am/ bag ma len pa des/ 'brog gnas 'khor dang bcas pa la zan sbyin
215a5('dul ba): zhing / gos phrugs re skon par byed do/ /ji tsam na mi dbul po zhig bag ma len du nye nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag la 'brog gnas 'khor dang bcas pa la zan sbyin zhing / gos phrugs
215a6('dul ba): re bskon pa'i 'byor pa ga la yod kyi/ 'di ltar/ bdag gis bag ma de blangs nas dang po kho nar 'brog gnas la dga' mgur spyod du phul la/ des dga' mgur spyad nas de'i 'og tu bdag
215a7('dul ba): gis spyad par bya'o/ /snyam du rig nas/ de 'brog gnas kyi gan du song ste mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/ grong dpon/ bdag bag ma len du nye na/ bdag la khyod 'khor dang bcas pa
215b1('dul ba): la bshos gsol zhing / na bza' phrugs re gsol ba'i 'byor pa ma mchis kyi/ 'di ltar/ bdag gis bag ma de blangs nas dang po kho nar khyod la dga' mgur spyod du 'bul gyi/ khyod kyis dga' mgur
215b2('dul ba): spyad nas de'i 'og tu bdag gis spyad par bgyi'o/ /'brog gnas kyis smras pa/ kwa'i nang rje/ gang yang rung ba bag ma len pa'am/ bag ma gtong ba de thams cad kyis kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa la zan sbyin
215b3('dul ba): zhing gos phrugs re skon mi dgos kyi/ khyod song la bag yangs su bag ma longs shig/ grong dpon/ de lta lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang bdag 'di ltar dga'i/ dang du bzhes shig /bud med kyi yul
215b4('dul ba): ni| dbang po rnams 'phrog cing don du gnyer bar 'gyur ba yin pas/ 'brog gnas kyis dang du blangs so/ /des kyang bag ma blangs nas dang po kho nar 'brog gnas la phul nas des kyang dga' mgur
215b5('dul ba): spyad do/ /'brog gnas 'dod pa la 'dod chags kyis lhag par chags pas/ mi de la byams par bya bar brtsams so/ /gzhan zhig gis de la smras pa/ kwa'i nang rje/ khyod la 'brog gnas te bor
215b6('dul ba): byams par gyur pa 'di la rgyu ci yod/ des ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang / des kyang de bzhin bya bar brtsams so/ /gzhan zhig gis de la dris pa dang / des kyang de la ji ltar gyur pa brjod pa dang / des kyang
215b7('dul ba): de bzhin bya bar brtsams so/ /gzhan zhig gis kyang de la dris pa dang / des kyang de la ji ltar gyur pa brjod pa nas des kyang de bzhin bya bar brtsams te/ de lta bu'i tshul gyis don dam pa ma yin pa'i chos
216a1('dul ba): 'phel bar gyur to/ /'brog gnas kyis tshong 'dus der lha khang rtsig tu bcug nas de na gang yang rung bas bag ma blangs pa des bu mo de lha khang de bskor du bcug nas 'brog
216a2('dul ba): gnas kyi gan du gtong zhing / 'brog gnas kyis de dang por dga' mgur spyod par byed do/ /ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na gzhon nu ma chen po zhig bag mar 'gror nye nas des bsam pa/ bdag la yang
216a3('dul ba): dang por 'brog gnas dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur zhing / phyis khyim thab spyod par 'gyur na mi rung gi /ci nas kyang 'brog gnas 'di gsad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i thabs kyi rnam pa zhig bya'o/ /snyam
216a4('dul ba): nas| des ji tsam na phyogs shig tu skye bo phal po che'i tshogs 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa de logs su kha bltas te sgron mor byung nas gcin rgyang byas pa dang / skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyis de
216a5('dul ba): mthong nas de dag mi dga' bar sems par gyur te smras pa/ bu mo ngo tsha dang khrel med pa/ skye bo phal po che'i tshogs la mdun gyis phyogs te sgron mor byung nas gcig rgyang byed pa 'di/ su'i yin/
216a6('dul ba): bu mo des de thos nas smras pa/ khyed cag kyang pho yin nam/ 'o na/ nged cag ci yin/ khyed cag pho ma yin gyi/ 'brog gnas 'ba' zhig pho yin pas/ des khyed kyis chung ma blangs so cog dang por
216a7('dul ba): dga' mgur spyad de/ khyed cag phyis de'i mi gtsang ba 'khru bar byed do/ /de dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag /'dis bdag cag gnas su spyod na/ 'di la bdag cag gis ji ltar bsgrub par
216b1('dul ba): bya| de na kha cig gis smras pa/ 'di la gzhan sgrub tu ci yod/ 'brog gnas gsad par bya'o/ /gzhan dag gis smras pa/ de ji ltar gsad par bya ba dpyad par bya'o/ /zhes de dag de ltar gros byed pa na/
216b2('dul ba): khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis rdzing bu 'bul ba nye bar gyur nas de dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag /khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gis rdzing bu 'bul bar nye bar gyur pas/ der de mgron du bos pa'i tshe
216b3('dul ba): gsad par bya'o/ /ji tsam na khyim bdag des rdzing bu 'bul ba'i tshe mgron du bos pa dang / des kyang dang du blangs so/ /rgyal po gzugs can snying pos dril sgrog pa byed du bcug ste phyogs su bsgo ba/ nga'i
216b4('dul ba): yul du dge slong gang la la zhig 'ong bar gyur na/ de gal te nga'i mdzod dang / khyim na bza' ba dang / btung ba yod na/ zan sbyin par bya'o/ /gal te med na/ sus mthong ba rang gis byin cig dang / phyis skyin
216b5('dul ba): pa nyis 'gyur du sbyin no/ /zhes rtsig yig tu yang bris te bzhag go /bar du tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gnyis ma ga d+ha dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing 'dong ba na/ 'brog gnas su
216b6('dul ba): phyin te/ tshong dpon 'brog gnas kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gnyis ma ga d+ha dag tu rgyu zhing 'dong ba na/ 'brog gnas su phyin ces thos so/ /thos nas kyang de 'di snyam du
216b7('dul ba): sems te/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po de bsod nams dag gis ngoms mi myong bas sbyin pa dag sbyin/ bsod nams dag byed na/ bdag gis kyang ci'i phyir sbyin pa dag mi sbyin/ bsod nams dag
217a1('dul ba): mi bya snyam du rig nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gnyis ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i
217a2('dul ba): phyir mdun du 'dug go / de gnyis kyis de la chos bstan nas/ des de gnyis bsod snyoms la bos te zan byin no/ /khyim bdag des/ 'brog gnas g.yar 'dren gyis bos pa dang / des yon bshad pa
217a3('dul ba): ma mnyan pa kho nar rdzing bu 'bul bar song ngo / /'brog gnas na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis kyang brda byas te mtshon thogs nas der dong ste de dag gis 'brog gnas rdzing bur zhugs pa dang / skra
217a4('dul ba): bkru'o/ /zhes 'gyur byed tsha ba mgor blugs nas mig chu 'dzag par gyur te cung zad kyang mi mthong ba dang / de nas de'i steng du 'khor lo dang / rdo rje rtse gcig dang / mda' bo dang / mtshon rtse gcig
217a5('dul ba): pa la sogs pa'i mtshon dag 'phang bar brtsams te/ de gsod par bshams pa na/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /kho bos khyed la nyes pa ci byas/ de dag gis smras pa/ khyod kyis kho bo cag
217a6('dul ba): gi bag ma dang por dga' dgur spyad cing / phyis kho bo cag gis spyad do/ /des smras pa/ khyed cag nyid kyis dam pa ma yin pa'i chos 'di phyung bas 'di la kho bos ci nyes/ ma gsad par thong zhig/
217a7('dul ba): de dag gis de ltar shags 'debs bzhin du gsad par brtsams pa dang / des srog dang 'bral khar gnad 'chad ka dang / tshigs 'grol kar sems bskyed de smon lam btab pa/ bdag gis
217b1('dul ba): 'phags pa shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po lha dang mis mchod pa gnyis la bsod snyoms phul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ bdag gang du 'di dag gsod par 'gyur pa der skye bar gyur cig/ ces
217b2('dul ba): btab bo/ /chos nyid kyis na mar 'bri ba'i dus kyi tshe na/ smon lam log pa btab pa de ni/ myur du 'grub pa yin pas des smon lam log pa btab ste shi zhing dus la bab nas gnod sbyin gdug pa rnams kyi
217b3('dul ba): nang du skyes so/ /de nas de gnas 'dod pas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i gan du song ste smras pa/ bzod ldan/ bdag la gnas stsol cig /des smras pa/ 'brog gnas/ khyod kyi gnas 'brog gnas de
217b4('dul ba): nyid yin gyi/ song zhig /de 'brog gnas su 'ongs nas mi ngas phyung ste/ skye bo mang po shi bar gyur nas khri dang / khrir 'dom par byas so/ /'brog gnas na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis ltas pa dag bkug
217b5('dul ba): ste bris pa/ shes ldan dag /gang gi phyir 'di lta bu'i yams byung bar gyur pa 'di la rgyu ci yod/ de dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag /khyed kyis 'brog gnas bsad pa gang yin pa des smon lam btab
217b6('dul ba): pas/ gnod sbyin gdug pa rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ des 'di lta bu'i yams phyung ngo / /de dag gis shing rta dang bcas te 'bros par brtsams pa dang / des kyang 'jigs pa dang / 'jigs su
217b7('dul ba): rung ba chen por bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas 'brog gnas na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'bros pa'i mdun du 'dug ste smras pa/ gar 'dong / deng khyed thams cad bza'o/ /de dag kun tu skrag
218a1('dul ba): par gyur te smras pa/ grong dpon/ bdag cag sdig pa byed pa rnams la bzod pa mdzod cig /des smras pa/ dam tshig gis bzod par bya ste/ gal te nga la nyi ma re re zhing mi
218a2('dul ba): stong stong 'bul na/ bzod do/ /de dag gis smras pa/ grong dpon/ gal te khyod la nyi ma re re bzhin mi stong stong phul na/ ring por mi thogs par 'brog gnas 'di mi snang bar 'gyur gyi/ dngan
218a3('dul ba): dus 'di thong la bdag cag phyag 'tshal ba rnams la bzod pa mdzod cig / des smras pa/ shes ldan dag /kho bo yun ring po nas smon pa/ kye ma/ 'brog gnas 'di mi snang bar gyur cig snyam
218a4('dul ba): mod kyi/ 'on kyang kho bo la nyi ma re re zhing mi lnga brgya lnga brgya phul cig dang / bzod par bya'o/ /de dag gis yang de bzhin gsol nas des kyang mi nyis brgya lnga bcu dang brgya'i bar du phul cig
218a5('dul ba): ces smras/ /de dag gis smras pa/ grong dpon/ de lta na yang bdag cag nyams par 'gyur gyi/ mang pos ci bya/ bdag cag gis khyod la nyi ma re re zhing ba lang drug dang ldan pa'i shing rta zas
218a6('dul ba): kyis bkang ba dang / de khrid pa'i mi gcig dbul gyi/ bzod par mdzod cig /des smras pa/ de rung gi/ 'di ltar/ khyed kyis du ba dag gis dbul bar mi bya bar bro dang / glu dang / sil snyan gyi
218a7('dul ba): sgras dbul bar bya'o/ /de dag gis kyang khas blangs so/ /de nas 'brog na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad 'dus te gros byas par brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag /gnod sbyin gyi bdag
218b1('dul ba): cag gnas skabs de ltar byas na/ 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ de na kha cig gis smras pa/ res kyis res kyis dbul bar bya'o/ /kha cig gis smras pa/ gang la res bab par gyur pa de la brjod pa na/ 'khrug
218b2('dul ba): pa skye bar 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar/ khyim byang bris te rdza mar bcug la/ gang gi khyim byang byung ba da 'gro bar bya ste/ des kyang mi tshab ma dag mi gtang bar bdag nyid 'gro bar bya ba'am/ bu gtang bar
218b3('dul ba): bya'o/ /gang la brel ba byung ste ma 'dus pa de la bab na/ de'i khyim du khyim byang dpyang ste gzhag go /de'i tshe na 'brog gnas na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa de la bu med nas yun ring po nas kye ma/ bdag
218b4('dul ba): la bu yod par gyur cig ces smon nas/ stes dbang gis de'i chung ma la sems can zhugs par gyur to/ /chung ma de btsa' ba'i dus kyi tshe khyim bdag de bya ba zhig la phyi rol tu byung ba dang / de'i nyin mo de la
218b5('dul ba): gnod sbyin la gtor ma sbyin pa'i khyim byang byung nas/ des res sbron par bskos pa'i mi dag gis de'i khyim sgor dbyangs te bzhag go /skabs der chung ma de btsas pa las khye'u zhig byung ngo / /ji tsam na khyim
218b6('dul ba): bdag de phyir 'ongs pa dang / des khyim du 'jug khar khyim byang des de mthong nas de sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bar gyur te khyim du zhugs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go /chung mas de la smras pa/ rje'i
218b7('dul ba): sras/ dgyes pa skyad cig /khyod kyi sras bltams so/ /de lta na yang cang mi smra ba kho nar 'dug go /chung mas de la lan gsum gyi bar du de skad smras kyang cang mi smra ba kho nar 'dug nas/ yang chung
219a1('dul ba): mas smras pa/ rje'i sras/ khyod yun ring po nas kye ma/ bdag la bu yod par gyur cig ces smon pa gang lags pa de/ da btsas na/ ci'i slad du cang mi gsung bar bzhugs/
219a2('dul ba): mchog tu dgyes pa skyed cig /des smras pa/ bzang mo/ 'di ni/ skyes na/ kho bo ni/ ma skyes so/ /rje'i sras/ ci nongs/ bzang mo/ gnod sbyin la gtor ma dbul ba'i phyir khyim byang 'ongs so/ /
219a3('dul ba): rje'i sras/ gal te de lta na/ khyod kyi sras 'chi bar bas mod/ skol cag yang mjal na/ khyod la sras mchis par 'gyur ro/ /bzang mo/ 'di ni/ khrag gi thigs pa yin pas 'di ji ltar gtang
219a4('dul ba): bar bya/ rje'i sras/ tshogs pas khrims su bgyi ba rnam par bzhag pa las bdag nyid 'gro bar bya ba'am/ bu gtang bar bya'o/ /zhes mi 'byung ngam/ 'di khyod kyi sras lags pas/ bdag
219a5('dul ba): nyid dang mnyam pa'i sdug pa gzhan ma mchis kyi/ sras 'di thong zhig /des gal te khyod dga' na/ song zhig ces dang du blangs so/ /de nas khyim bdag gi chung ma des mtshan mo mig lam
219a6('dul ba): chad pa dang / mar me dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba rgyu dang / me tog dag gis mchod pa byas nas kha shar phyogs su bltas te gsol ba gdab par brtsams pa/ 'jig rten dge dul zhi ba
219a7('dul ba): dang / /dbang thul rnams kyis mi stong pas/ /bu yi don du der 'dud kyi/ /bdag gi byis pa bskyab tu gsol/ /de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la ni/ mi mkhyen pa dang /
219b1('dul ba): ma gzigs pa dang / ma rig pa dang / rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' bas/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten la phan par bzhugs pa/ srung pa gcig pu pa/ nyag cig dpa' ba/
219b2('dul ba): gnyis pa med pa/ gnyis su mi gsung pa/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis bzhugs pa/ rig pa gsum gsal bar mdzad pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslab pa/ dul ba'i gnas gsum gyi
219b3('dul ba): gzhi la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las brgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis spyod pa'i gzhi la legs par gnas pa/ bsu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas yongs su sbyang ba mdzad pa/ mi 'jigs
219b4('dul ba): pa bzhis bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba/ yan lag lnga spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ rtag tu gnas pa drug gis
219b5('dul ba): gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ lam gyi yan lag brgyad ston pa/ mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur
219b6('dul ba): snyan pas yang dag par rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcur dbang bsgyur ba las khyad par du 'phags pa rnams kyi chos nyid ni/ nyin lan gsum/ mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la
219b7('dul ba): rnam par gzigs nas gang ni/ nyams par gyur/ gang ni/ 'phel bar gyur/ /gang ni/ gnod par gyur/ gang ni/ nyam nga bar gyur/ gang ni/ mi bde bar gyur/ gang ni/ gnod pa dang / nyam
220a1('dul ba): nga ba dang / mi bde bar gyur/ gang ni/ ngan song la gzhol/ gang ni/ ngan song la 'bab/ gang ni/ ngan song la bab/ gang ni/ ngan song gi lam nas bslang ste mtho ris
220a2('dul ba): dang / thar pa dang / 'bras bu la gzhag par bya/ 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba gang gi lag nas ni/ drang bar bya/ 'phags pa'i nor gyi dbyig dang bral ba gang ni/ 'phags pa'i nor gyi dbang phyug la
220a3('dul ba): gzhag par bya/ gang gi sangs rgyas 'byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten ni/ 'bras bu dang bcas par bya/ gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag ma bskyed pa ni/ bskyed par bya/ gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag
220a4('dul ba): bskyed pa ni/ yongs su smin par bya/ yongs su smin pa gang ni/ rnam par grol bar bya zhes mkhyen pa dang / gzigs pa 'jug go /smras pa/ chu srin gnas kyi dug can pa/ /dus las 'da'
220a5('dul ba): bar 'gyur srid kyi/ /sangs rgyas gdul la byams pa ni/ /dus las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar ma ni bu sdug gcig pu la/ /rtog cing de srog srung bar byed pa ltar/ /de bzhin gshegs
220a6('dul ba): pa'ang 'dul ba'i skye bo la/ /rtog par mdzad cing de srog srung bar mdzad/ /kun mkhyen rgyud la lnga ba'i thugs rje yi/ /bzhon ma 'dul ba'i be'u tshol mi skyo ste/ /srid dang ngan 'gros nyams
220a7('dul ba): la byams pa ni/ /rab nyams be'u la byams pa'i ba bzhin no/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ khye'u de ni/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la bya ba lhag par byas pa yin pas/ de la
220b1('dul ba): phan gdags par bya zhing / gnod sbyin 'brog gnas kyang gdul bar bya'o/ /snyam du rig nas ma ga d+ha dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs nas 'brog gnas su byon te 'brog gnas na gnod sbyin 'brog
220b2('dul ba): gnas kyi gnas su mtshan mo gnas par zhal gyis bzhes so/ /de'i tshe na gnod sbyin 'brog gnas gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin 'du bar song bar gyur to/ /gnod sbyin bong bu pas/ bcom ldan 'das
220b3('dul ba): gnod sbyin 'brog gnas kyi gnas su mtshan mo gnas par zhal gyis bzhes par mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang gnod sbyin 'brog gnas ga la ba der song ste phyin nas gnod sbyin 'brog gnas la 'di
220b4('dul ba): skad ces smras so/ /grong dpon/ khyed kyi gnas su bcom ldan 'das mtshan mo gnas par zhal gyis bzhes pa gang yin pa de ni/ khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /grong dpon/ mi gyur pa yang
220b5('dul ba): bdag gi gnas su mtshan mo gnas par khas len tam/ grong dpon/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so/ /grong
220b6('dul ba): dpon/ de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin nam/ 'on te ma yin pa shes par bya'o/ /de nas gnod sbyin 'brog gnas kyis gnod sbyin rnams kyi
220b7('dul ba): gnod sbyin 'du ba zil gyis mnan nas/ rang gi gnas ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces sol to/ /dge sbyong / phyir phyung zhig /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni/
221a1('dul ba): gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba'o/ /snyam du dgongs nas slar byung ngo / /dge sbyong / zhugs shig /bcom ldan 'das rgyags pa dang / nga rgyal nges par bcom pa'i phyir zhugs
221a2('dul ba): so| |gnod sbyin 'brog gnas kyis lan gnyis su yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong / phyir phyung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni/ gzhan gyis yongs su bzung

221a4('dul ba): gsum du yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge sbyong / phyir phyung zhig /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni/ gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba'o/ /snyam du dgongs nas slar byung / /
